reviews.review: Had since February, lightly used but now my left joy con won't charge tried the troubleshooting steps on their official website still nothing i also have a standalone charging base for my joycons and it won't charge either, seeing online this is a common issue. Opened a repair request ticket with Nintendo which advised me to wait until they contact me to ship it to them and once they get it, may several weeks to fix it, bummer I had just got animal crossing too and Ican't play it with one joy con and I refuse to buy another one for 80 dollars. Didn't realize how poor quality Nintendo has become I'll be sending animal crossing back and hope since it's no point in having it now.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2022
reviews.name: Alan C. Logan
reviews.title: Great little system
reviews.review: I basically use my Switch as a retro console and it certainly has a large library of ports and game collections, plus the online games you can purchase from the eshop. Honestly nothing bad to say about this little system.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020
reviews.name: Ethan (GeckoNetGamer64)
reviews.title: Nintendo Switch with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con - HAC-001(-01)
reviews.review: The moment that I received my new Nintendo Switch, so so so much fun. Easy to setup and link to your Nintendo account online. Battery lasts up to 10 hours before recharge. I have to say, this multi functional console is awesome. Console can be used like a 3DS or like a regular console (has a docking station). Highly recommended. Only issue is that there is high demand for this console and not many up for sale at this time.Nintendo Switch is well priced and a easy travel companion which can easily slip into your backpack etc.Fun for All Ages.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2022
reviews.name: Kendra
reviews.title: More than a scratch
reviews.review: I bought it used and it said very good and just had a scratch on it but it has more than one which is no big deal and it also has a problem with the left joystick because it just starts going in the up direction all the time on its own and you can't stop the cursor or stop the character or anything half the time. I have to hit the home button to go out of the software and go back to it for it to stop scrolling up. I'm not real thrilled

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.name: Prudence Lamb
reviews.title: Fun for the entire family!
reviews.review: I grew up with Nintendo. Receiving a Nintendo system for Christmas was about the coolest gift, ever.Purchased a Nintendo Switch for my husband for Christmas. Our entire family has been enjoying the console. The graphics are amazing. I love this version as it can be used on the t.v. or in the car.My husband is the techie one, so I am sure he can speak to the games, graphics etc. However, if you can get your hands on one, you won't be disappointed. Upgraded and exciting for the next generation of Nintendo lovers.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.name: Vini
reviews.title: Now I see why it's always sold out
reviews.review: One of the coolest, most fun, most unexpected purchases I've made in a long time. I bought this as a gift for a family member but it wasn't easy at all, simply due to the fact that it's never available (always out of stock). I was curious as to why. It didn't take me more than 10-minutes after opening the box and setting up the Switch to see why it's such a hot item. It is worth every penny!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020
reviews.name: Alma
reviews.title: Drift after three days of use.
reviews.review: After three days of use I started experiencing drift. Not only that it was used and damaged. $500 for a broken switch is not worth it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
reviews.name: Jake Paske
reviews.title: ITS THE NEW MODEL!!!
reviews.review: It’s great! Bought this to play Pokémon since I waited 3 years for them to release games I had been waiting on. Sold my original switch, this one is the new model with the longer battery life! And it’s definitely noticeable. I have gone entire days (hour are a time usage)using it and not had to charge it till I got home or went to bed. One issue that still remains is the onboard WiFi on the console is still just as bad as it was in the first original model.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.name: Robbysan
reviews.title: Open box or used unit. Untruthful ad.
reviews.review: I received mine in a non Nintendo box. It had a couple of light scuff marks. It seems to work OK, bit it stinks to get an open box unit when it was not advertised as such. The price I paid was not open box price, by any means. I'm not set against open box, but tell me that's what I am getting. If it wasn't my daughter's birthday gift, I would send it back. I definitely feel ripped off

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.name: DigitalArtist
reviews.title: My phone has more processing power and a better display.
reviews.review: It's just too weak of a system to be enjoyable to play. Graphics look two or three generations old. Frame rates are 30 fps or lower on most titles and the display is on par with a Kindle fire. And despite the fact that this device is little more than a low-end tablet, most of the games sell for $60! A modern tablet or even an Amazon firestick can offer a better gaming experience in most ways. The controllers and build quality are nice. The dock is easy to use, but for me the overall value just isn't there. Somehow, my kids seem to like it well enough though...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020
reviews.name: Charles Sylvest
reviews.title: Great fun, awful repair support $$$
reviews.review: Purchased for December 2019 gift for my 8 year old. Great fun playing hand held and in game console mode.Sent for repair bc crouch button he said did not work and the sound jack was loosing connections. Tested on multiple headsets.Nintendo would not repair under warranty because of over use. What? Was he crouching too much in his games? You buy something and it doesn’t last 8 months (less than thst bc I made him play on it a couple of months before sending it in). We have to pay to get something repaired that didn’t make it a year. Totally unfair. What’s to break next? You would like to know a company stands behind its product within the first year at least.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
reviews.name: Chad Hines
reviews.title: Nintendo Switch is Magnificent
reviews.review: First off I want to thank Amazon for the gracious price.Magnificent machine. Plays very well. Fun fun games. As a person that plays video games on every system from PlayStation to Xbox to PC I have to say I am very impressed. Highly recommend the games are the legend of Zelda breath of the wild, Mario‘s odyssey, astral Chain, Super smash brothers.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
reviews.name: Family Researcher
reviews.title: Family gift was loved by all.
reviews.review: We gifted this for Christmas tofamily of five.What a surprise to them, and all were very happy.I like that it is portable and not take uplots of space and also can play on the TV monitor. It seems well thought out to be versatile.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: I bought it for Animal Crossing
reviews.review: On the whole, this exceeded expectations.It not only connected to my TV, the cable was included.I can use it as a handheld game machine or put the controllers in the "Joy-Con Grip" to use as a wireless PC game controller.Everything I hoped for, right out of the box.One "feature" has me tearing my hair out,however.The positions of the A and B buttons are reversed.The do it and cancel action buttons.It's like a non-qwerty keyboard for a touch typist.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.name: mstaralynn
reviews.title: Great system
reviews.review: I am a 41 yo mom of 3. We have all the gaming systems (🙄). But I have never been interested in video games until we bought the switch & Zelda Breath of the Wild.So fun. And I love how easy it is to take places & even to take to friends houses to all play together on the TV. It’s so small - even taking the dock with its not a hassle To take it places unlike when my kids want to being their PS4 or Xbox somewhere.Anyway. It’s fun. Get it. Don’t be lame.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.name: Amy Janowski
reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.review: So, the games are crazy expensive. In order to play any games online, you have to subscribe to their game pass! I never would have bought this if I would have known it is all about money. My daughter wanted to play among us. Free everywhere, but $5 on Nintendo. Ok, $5. Then she goes on...oh, you want to play with people, $5 a month. After spending hundreds of dollars on a gaming system, everything costs more money. Xbox doesn't do that, should have went with the play station instead. I don't recommend!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
reviews.name: Evilmetsfan
reviews.title: Great system would recommend
reviews.review: I love the game and function of the system so much. The dock mode to handheld and vice versa is fantastic. I will say that this system is one of the most fragile consoles in recent memory. I am afraid to use it in handheld in certain situations because if it drops you’ll be very lucky it doesn’t break. I went through a pair of Joy cons already due to this. All in all amazing system just fragile.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
reviews.name: N A
reviews.title: Amazing Console
reviews.review: The switch is honestly the perfect console. Being able to easily transition from a portable console on the go to a docked console connected to your TV is everything I wanted. When I am tired and no longer want to sit at the TV and play, I grab it and jump in bed and just continue. My only issue is quite technical: the resistance of the Joycon controller buttons is too high. Takes too much effort to press them down. I got a pro controller and the difference is astounding. I don't understand why the Joycons don't have "soft" buttons like the pro controller does.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.name: Jordan
reviews.title: Kids (teens) love this!
reviews.review: Bought this for our local Teen Center program and the kids love it we ordered a couple of wired controllers that can also be used with it so they can play in a group and they have been having a blast.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.name: Conner Wagner
reviews.title: Game reader stopped working
reviews.review: Bought the switch it worked just fine then a few months later the game reader stopped working so I could no longer put games into the switch to play. I contacted the seller within the warranty time and the refused to message back at all and then blocked me from messaging them. I would go through a different seller if possible.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.name: Agustin Sandoval
reviews.title: Nice console
reviews.review: A nice console so far, great price all things considered, it's not as powerful as an xbox or a play station but it kinda gets you entertained, it has a nice library of games and although I'm not used to play on the go it's nice to have the option, the only thing that's really a bummer it's the price of the games, they're really expensive considerig the price of the other two consoles, it's definitely a different console but it's fun and a nice acquisition for a gamer

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
reviews.name: ack
reviews.title: does not turn on)The Nintendo has a lot of problems connecting to the tv, Overprice, lagging
reviews.review: I am making an update inmy review.On top of all other bad things happening with my nintendo, now the screen has frozen- and dies not want to turn on. I tried everything on google and youtube to turn it on but is not working. It has been one year and the product is broken in so many ways- and finally not even turning on :((((((My Nintendo won't connect to the tv I've tried so many times it just won't connect. The games are overpriced like Minecraft for 30$. And you can't do anything without online membership. The games lag way to much for a 300$ console and I always crash in my games especially Minecraft.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019
reviews.name: kelly
reviews.title: Comes in a GameStop box with "refurbished" all over it
reviews.review: This is a great deal but it doesn't tell you anywhere in the post that it doesn't come in original packaging. It even shows it in the Nintendo box. I had to seek and buy an original empty box off eBay Because my son knows about GameStop and believes in Santa still. I didn't want any doubt put in his head. A heads up anywhere in the post would've been nice is all I'm saying. Still a good deal but plan on adding $20+ and buying a box from eBay if you want it in the box as shown.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.name: Tim
reviews.title: Received much sooner than promised, pricing was the competitive retail price
reviews.review: I bought the Nintendo Switch, so I could spend time with my Grandchildren playing online.The switch units were out of stock everywhere.The price, $299.99 on Amazon, was the typical retail price while some places were charging much more if they had stock.So I decided to place the order on Amazon and when it was available it would ship.I guess my timing was just right.I placed the order on a Friday night and the anticipated delivery was originally 3-4 weeks.I received several updates over the weekend, and the unit was delivered on the following Monday afternoon.Good price, good delivery, the unit was the latest model and was a new unit not a re-manufactured unit.Ideal transaction

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.name: Meg
reviews.title: Delightful console
reviews.review: Awesome console! I was reading other people’s reviews and realized the battery concerns on the console earlier to this one. And the console I got has pretty solid battery life—I could play until I kind of want a break and without being interrupted by battery low alerts (or perhaps I’m just not that professional a player). But I think for people like me seeking some break from work before getting back to it, the battery life feels decently adequate. Apart from battery, everything else works well too.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviews.name: Michelle
reviews.title: Favorite purchase ever!
reviews.review: By far my and my family's favorite gaming system ever! Believe me we've had so many gaming consoles over the years. My 8 year old girl will not put this down! She loves Zelda! We plah Just Dance frequently and it has excellent intelligence to what you are doing. It really gets you moving if you are willing! You can play classic with it hooked up in a dock and connected to the TV (console is very small which is great), or you can put the joy cons on the console and play, of you can play with it looking like a old Nintendo 64 controller or x box/playstation controller. It's also touch screen!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
reviews.name: jesus g.
reviews.title: Product was sold as new and was actually Used, Dirty and Incomplete
reviews.review: My order especifies "NEW" product. I received an used and incomplete set of dirty pieces.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.name: Vitor Pina
reviews.title: BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!
reviews.review: I bought this for my son for Christmas... two weeks later it simply stopped taking charge with no apparent damage to the charging port. Sent it to Nintendo for repair, they sent it back unrepaired and said it was not covered by the warranty. I recently sent it again and was charged by Nintendo $115 for repair. My issue here is that Amazon is selling defective products, Nintendo does not want to fix their products nor did they reach out to me to ask if I want to pay for the repair. It costs more than $300, who in their right mind would throw it away. Now to repair I paid more than $100 so I'm close to $500 for a damn Switch! I could of just bought a PS5 with that money.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.name: Capt Half Pint
reviews.title: So much fun
reviews.review: Grown woman here who bought this for herself. Super excited to play Mario 64 and Mario Kart again. Item arrived sooner than expected and in perfect condition.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.name: Tim
reviews.title: Do NOT GET PRICE GOUGED!
reviews.review: I absolutely adore the Switch and Nintendo as a whole, I’ve had a dry spell with them recently and buying a Switch changed that.Anyways, as many of you already know, the damper on production ability and rise in demand have seriously affected the availability of this product. BUT you can still get them new, at MSRP, like I did!There are bots that can notify you when there is stock for any specific model, color you’re looking for. I used a Discord called “stock informer” and was able to get a Switch at its actual MSRP within a day.Be careful out there, don’t cave in to the gougers. It’s not worth it. You’ll be spending a lot on games, anyway. So save your money!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
reviews.name: Munchkin Lane
reviews.title: Scratched screen (obvi return) for sons birthday gift
reviews.review: This is supposed to be brand new. The protective film was not there, and the screen is scuffed. This was my sons birthday present. Amazon is becoming known for a serious lack of quality control when it comes to these expensive items.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
reviews.name: DCB
reviews.title: Best videogame console ever made
reviews.review: The nintendo switch is the best videogame console ever made.That feels hyperbolic to write but it is true. The versatility of design alone is worh the price tag, not to mention game library. I play it every day. It's very well designed. The weight as a handheld is perfect, how it docks and plays on a big screen is perfect, the 20$ /month online play is amazing that comes with perks...I've been buying videogame consoles since the NES and this is easily the best one ever made.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.name: Dozer
reviews.title: Finally!!!!
reviews.review: So, my switch got here a 1:22pm today. My only issue is... I ordered the switch 1st of all my items and it was the last to be delivered. RUDE!! there than that, VERY HAPPY.Set up was easy, as far as physical connections.As far as wifi I suggest, if you device won't be living close to the router, make 1st contact near the router then move to where you what your switch to live.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.name: theresa
reviews.title: Defective
reviews.review: Bought in July gave as a gift in August. September rolls around & left side controller not responding to movement matching up to game. Called Amazon they said call manufacturer because it was already out of the return window. Called manufacturer & went through trouble shooting. They agreed it was defective & I needed to send it in & they would just replace the left side it would take 3 to 4 weeks! Amazon would not even offer me a discount on another one. Crappy customer service!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2020
reviews.name: Mack
reviews.title: Nostalgic!
reviews.review: I’ve been a Nintendo kid at heart for many years. I haven’t owned a Nintendo since I had a SNES, but a friend convinced me to get the Switch.It’s nice! I’m not playing it as much as I should...but it’s nice! There’s a good selection of indie games on the store and I just bought the 3-in-1 Mario collection. It’ll be interesting to see what else comes out of Nintendo as we move into the next generation.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.name: Ryan Lemm
reviews.title: Yay switch
reviews.review: I got both a switch and switch lite. Love them sooo much. If you are up in the air about which to get the lite is FAR SUPERIOR as a handheld device. It has a D pad, it’s significantly lighter and just feels great in your hands. The regular switch obviously can do much more and now has a longer battery life. However it does feel cumbersome as a handheld device compared to the lite, but a nice grip case will help with that. Skull and co makes a great case

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
reviews.name: A. Drewes ❤ Product Reviewer
reviews.title: KIDS LOVED IT!
reviews.review: I got this for my 11-year-old daughter for Christmas and she LOVES it. Turns out my 5-year-old and husband enjoy playing on it as well! It's not a nice size screen and it's really cool that you can play it on the go or hook it up and play on the TV. You do need to make a Nintendo account, though, if you don't already have one in order to play on it, but overall set up was easy and didn't take too long. While the system was expensive it was definitely worth the investment! I do suggest getting a case to keep it in to keep it safe when not in use, though.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2020
reviews.name: Marcus Sanatan
reviews.title: The Best Console I've bought
reviews.review: Nintendo's handheld genius has matched their console experiments to create the Switch. I use it mostly in handheld mode but docking it is seamless. It has a lot of games for me to enjoy, a lot of games for non-gamers to enjoy, and games that entire groups can enjoy. It feels like the best console I've ever owned.Between the Nintendo 1st party titles like the amazing Zeldas (Breath of the Wild and Link's Awakening) the many top-notch indie games that are flooding the Nintendo shop (Gris, Transistor, Indivisible) - I'm a content gamer.I have a PS4 and would play their amazing library of games intermittently. However, the Switch's library has caused my game time to exponentially increase. You would only do yourself a favour by buying it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.name: Brad W
reviews.title: Brand new system in perfect condition
reviews.review: I didn't realize they're charging $50 more than Gamestop until I looked at other reviews, but since I still had $50 left on a giftcard, I'm not too bothered by it. The console was brand new and works very well. It didn't take more than a week to arrive. At the end of the day, if you want a Switch and there is nowhere real close by that has them in stock, I'd reccomend it. Only thing is I think its asinine for these guys to want to increase the price just based on the color of the controllers... I wanted black, but I wasn't paying extra for that. As for people being floored by the price, I mean, it was your choice to by it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
reviews.name: alfred beatty
reviews.title: Great, versatile gaming system
reviews.review: This system is awesome! I love that it can be carried around and used as a personal game system or I can pop it into its dock and play on a big screen. It's extremely easy to set up, to use, and to play.I bought the year long Family Subscription to Nintendo Online and each of my kids has their own profile. They can take turns playing alone, or quickly jump in on a shared game. We even got my wife involved once I bought Monopoly from the Nintendo Online Store. I highly recommend the system for any families or anyone who enjoys all levels of gaming

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
reviews.name: xeR0
reviews.title: Nintendo's best console in a long time
reviews.review: The switch is a great console. if you want to read a review of it read some other ones. I want to talk about the seller "PartyPieces inc." The switch is sold out everywhere right now. I was able to find this one listed with a 7-day shipping turnaround ( versus months like other listings ). I'm happy to say it took only one day extra for me to receive the product. eight days total. I am extremely pleased with sellers honesty and fast turnaround time. highly recommended seller.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.name: Kittenbaum
reviews.title: Perfect Gift
reviews.review: My wife wanted to get a system she could have multiple people play our old school love of video games. Games such as Mario U, Tetris, Mario Kart and now Animal Crossing. Coming from the era of first generation gaming this is the ideal system for us!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
reviews.name: cobra
reviews.title: Joy-con won’t slide off
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch is really fun to play games on, but there is one issue. The left joycon on my Nintendo Switch takes too much effort to slide off. I literally have to hold the console and pull on the joycon to remove it. This is not how the other joycon operates. The one on the right slides off easily like it should. I haven’t returned it because I usually don’t use it in docked mode, but when I do remove the joycons for docked mode, I somewhat regret purchasing the console. I probably should have requested a replacement, but it’s too late for that now.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.name: Kim
reviews.title: Not the greatest
reviews.review: The review I gave it the first time was denied. So let’s try again. It’s the worst product that I ever bought from Amazon. I can’t include the shipping experience bc it’s against the rules. But I don’t have the item so I have to say that it’s worthless. I bought it almost a month ago and well… to say it works great… I wouldn’t know.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2019
reviews.name: Jesus Barba
reviews.title: Defective joycons ruin an otherwise perfect console
reviews.review: Almost everything about this console is perfect but the joy cons are flawed and Nintendo continues to ship the defective line as standard issue in switch and switch lite

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
reviews.name: Livy F
reviews.title: Who doesn't love Nintendo?
reviews.review: Great gift for family or yourself. Lots of options for games to download. Like that you can use it handheld or with the TV, and with cartridges or online.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.name: Rich D.
reviews.title: Bought Two Switches and my kids can't play the same game simultaneously -- ***CHRISTMAS HASSLE***
reviews.review: Gave both kids Nintendo Switches for Christmas today. Now my wife is angry with me because I've spent several hours trying to set them up so my kids can play the same game at the same time on their respective Switches. Paid for and downloaded a game and it will only play on one Switch. Then I signed up for an online family plan out of sheer desperation, assuming that would help, but they still can't play the same game on both switches simultaneously. I'm leaning towards returning both Switches -- this experience has been far too painful and time consuming. This should not be so difficult.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
reviews.name: SP
reviews.title: Great portable gaming console
reviews.review: The coronavirus shortage is incredible. Isearched everywhere for 2 months and didnt want to pay the markup from third party sellers who were going for $500. I finally was able to order from amazon for $299.99 but on a 8 weeks delay. I placed the order and to my surprise it came in less than 2 weeks. Now on the console itself i give it 5 stars even though i wish it had more built in memory. My kid loves it. It's portable, so you can take it anywhere. The online gaming ecosystem though is build to milk you like a cow so one less star for that. Like most/all games are exclusiveand very expensive.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
reviews.name: ThisIsNotMyRealName
reviews.title: The scalping is ridiculous
reviews.review: Good console if you can get it for MSRP, it took me weeks of trying to buy before I was able to get through the checkout process with all the scalpers buying them up within minutes.Don't pay over MSRP, the shortage is temporary.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
reviews.name: EA~
reviews.title: Family fun
reviews.review: This is the longer lasting battery version, which makes for great portable fun. Good sized memory card, and you're ready to go with multiple kid and family friendly games.The only bad thing is you cant buy the old classic games like on the switch, instead you have to subscribe to a monthly service- but you have access to a lot more games thru the subscription.I dont know, that's a toss up.The system itself is great, comes with everything you need to get going (except a game)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2022
reviews.name: Presil
reviews.title: excellent
reviews.review: It was brand new and arrived on time. I do not like the system in general the games are too expensive and you have to pay for a membership in order to purchase these games! you can not play unless you buy the games and they are expensive. You can get about 2 games free for the first timers but that is it. You cant play online unless you own the game.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020
reviews.name: JAG
reviews.title: Mostly as described, $30 holiday listing was phony
reviews.review: Factory, but the $30 reward/rebate was obviously a scamazon issue. Shoulda bought it at target, a retailer at least will qualify the $30 rebate. And acknowledge it actually existed.Class action anyone?

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.name: Shari Smith
reviews.title: You Can Get The Switch For MSRP!
reviews.review: I ordered the Nintendo Switch for MSRP and I thought it was too good to be true, but I ordered it Thursday and it came Monday! The website I used to help me find stock was stockinformer.com. It alerts you the minute there's Switch stock and you just have to be quick enough to buy it. It may take a few times and a few clicks but I was eventually able to purchase mine and I love this thing! It's really helped me curb boredom. I hope this helps anyone and please don't buy a Switch from any of these 3rd parties jacking up the price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2020
reviews.name: Elizabeth & Nuribeth
reviews.title: Great During Quarantine
reviews.review: Finally found one used one night at 2am and bought it. Was listed as acceptable condition, but the system and accessories looked like it was in "Like New" condition. Been wanting one, but all these price gougers were making it impossible. So far so good. I haven't had any issues that I've seen with the Switch itself. Only thing I have noticed is that there is already joy con drift on the right joy con. Absolutely worth the wait for the right price. Me and the family are really enjoying it during the quarantine.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.name: Cat
reviews.title: I got a defective one, but
reviews.review: The only issue I have/had is that I had gotten a defective Switch. It zapped me when I touched it anytime it was docked. I contacted Nintendo and they quickly resolved the issue. I would have given this a 5 star review if it weren't for that. I have really enjoyed using the Switch. It's such an innovative console. To be able to remove the joycons, have a touch screen, or go into tv mode to suit my preference for whatever I'm playing is honestly fantastic.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.name: Summerbabie
reviews.title: Don’t buy from here
reviews.review: Don’t not buy on here your best off at game stop or Nintendo.com my son stop working after 6 months won’t hold a charge or even charge at that I try to get help an nothing waste of money messed my son Christmas up I got him all these games for nothing. Ow have to return then an get him a whole new system with is ridiculous because I paid over $300. Never again !!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
reviews.name: Teresa
reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.review: I love the versatility of this console. It is lightweight and since I have advanced rheumatoid arthritis that is a real bonus there are thousands of games and the online store gives great sales. Would definitelyrecommend the switch as it can be a hand held or a home console either way you want to use it and the price is very reasonable as well.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.name: Yoseob Lee
reviews.title: Bad Controllers
reviews.review: Only used it about 3-4 times and already the controllers are losing connections where it won't move at random times as it glitches and refuses to move. If I had bought a cheaper version of controllers, I would've understood if this happened, but for controllers that come with the original packaging, this is such a disappointment. If you're looking to buy this, make sure to think about getting additional controllers as it may glitch on your end as well.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022
reviews.name: Zamir Tovar
reviews.title: Este producto da lo mas importante en la vida que es ver a los hijos felices.
reviews.review: Este Nintendo lo compré para mi hijo, cumplió las expectativas muy buena calidad, todos estamos muy satisfechos y sobre todo mi hijo súper feliz, esa era la intención, de verdad lo recomiendo excelente.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020
reviews.name: Jennifer Mueller
reviews.title: Best game console yet
reviews.review: Honestly one of my best purchases of the year. It is so portable; you can attach it to your TV or take it on the go in console form. I only have bought one game, Animal Crossing, but I have enjoyed my purchase so much. It is out of stock so often so I recommend setting a stock alert so you don't have to pay for an up-charge.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
reviews.name: Calvin Vernon
reviews.title: Don't pay more than 299.
reviews.review: I am happy with the switch so far. I've been having a great time playing Breath of the wild and Super Smash Brothers. Using stock informer, I was able to get 2 units shipped from Amazon LLC. At first when I paid it stated it would take 3 weeks till delivery. Then it updated and arrived with in 3 days both time I ordered units in June and July 2020. Be patient and just keep refreshing the web page after being notified. They drop multiple units a day.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.name: Amber Carroll
reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
reviews.review: The Nintendo switch was my son’s only request from Santa.Santa delivered and my son was thrilled, for 2 months that is.After 2 months the device gave an error and no longer turned on.Major disappointment for my son, a brand like Nintendo, and of course Santa who is out of pocket $300.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
reviews.name: Ella
reviews.title: Having Issues
reviews.review: First 3 weeks great product until everytime I go to play a game it makes a loud sound so loud I can’t even play... really disappointed because I paid a lot for this console. I messaged seller and hopefully I get an answer back.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
reviews.name: Laura
reviews.title: Works well and fun to play
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch was bought for my son for his 12th birthday. So far its been about 2 weeks give or take and he still loves it. It works well, no issues with the delivery, packaging or the product.He loves playing on it during free times from school, homework and after school activities.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.name: HRS Sales
reviews.title: The consul is a great buy. It’s a lot of fun to play with the whole family. Love Nintendo
reviews.review: I would’ve given them five stars but the controllers are not the best. They’re kind of cheesy and cheap. The games that go with this Consol are excellent. I’m not in the shoot them Up kind of games.I like fun games. And the Nentedo switch definitely carries a bunch of them. They have a nice accessory package for about $56 on Amazon I would highly recommend getting it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
reviews.name: Madison zeman
reviews.title: Must have!
reviews.review: I absolutely love my switch! It's like having every game system in one! I do not regret this purchase one bit. I absolutely love it!!!!! I am 31 with a 2 year old daughter. I have plenty of games I like to play and she does as well. She loves to play Just dance 2021 and it's simple to use and install.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.name: Lilie Allen
reviews.title: Paid for twice
reviews.review: Well, haven't used it yet but paid for it twice.Can't get the right mode of contact to get double charge corrected.Two conversations and what feels like a tennis game.So, hope it works.Would like to rate for performance at some point.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Be Careful, Joy-Con breaks easily
reviews.review: The switch is a great game system but my blue joy-con broke within a couple days of playing with it. It was very disappointing as I bought it for my son’s birthday so I waited about a month before giving it to him. Of course, that meant I could not return it once the controller broke. We had planned a big road trip and I was hoping the switch would keep him entertained but because of the broken controller, it was useless the whole time. Nintendo has a warranty on it, but being holiday season I haven’t gone through their “process” of returning it and getting a new one. All I can say is its been a very disappointing experience with this Nintendo product delivered by Amazon. Just sucks something so expensive can break so easy.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2022
reviews.name: Carlos Loubriel
reviews.title: Great console
reviews.review: Great console.There are many games to play on the switch.I was using a switch lite and I switched over so I could play on the tv.There are great exclusives like Mario, Zelda, pokemon, and smash ultimate.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.name: Super Saiya
reviews.title: Not powerful enough
reviews.review: The switch is the same price as PS4 and it is hard to get. However, in my view it is not as powerful as PS4. Thought it has its own advantage such as small, easy to travel, etc. But, due to the current situation, these are not the points I am looking for. Most of the time, I just play games in my house so I would epect a console more powerful to match the picture quality of my TV. But switch can only play some small games not 3A games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020
reviews.name: SKayeHan
reviews.title: Perfect Condition!
reviews.review: Product came the first day of the projected arrival timeframe which was an exciting surprise! Packaging was USPS in a sturdy USPS box and taped very well with "do not break seal" type packaging tape which I really appreciated. Product came as advertised in Nintendo box, brand new, all main gaming system components and accessories still in plastic wrap and scratch resistant wrap. I'm very very happy with this purchase!! It was purchased as a gift to a family member as a way to help with the stress of all that's going on and I couldn't be happier with my order! Thank you!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.name: zhenzhen zhang
reviews.title: Difficult installation.
reviews.review: I bought this unit to exercise with the help of my big screen TV; unfortunately it is not as easy to install as seen in the description.I read the instruction but still could not install the station to my big screen TV; finally I am thinking to return it to the Seller. This assembly is made of thin plastic so I have to mount it next to the TV; I am afraid that it might break if accidental drop for some reasons. Its weight is quite light compared to other brands; game cartridges are not included and they cost about $50 each.I am not happy with its performances so far and would not recommend to others.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.name: Rona
reviews.title: Best Game System, EVER!!!
reviews.review: My daughter bought me this where we can play Animal Crossing together.We visit each others islands and play hide and seek! It goes with me Everywhere, so I'm never bored. AC let's me be creative!!! Try it, you'll fall in Love.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.name: Tim Hatfield
reviews.title: New Product listed as New
reviews.review: The product was in good condition. However, I purchased what appeared to be a new product. It was wasnt listed anywhere that I would be getting a used item. When my product arrived, I quickly realized that I was sold a used item because I didn’t have a pin to access any controls. The name of the previous family was listed on the product. I actually would t have minded a used Switch however I need to be able access the product. It’s very disappointing that I now have to wait over a month for another item.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
reviews.name: darrell
reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
reviews.review: Only had it for 2 months for my son before it seized up and the only online help you can get is they say reset it by pressing the power button for 20 sec which obviously did not work waste of $300 not to mention that every game cost almost $50 so I'm out $500, should have kept my son on Android play store at least the games are free and don't cost $50 each only to lose them.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
reviews.name: CISO_GUY
reviews.title: Excellent Device sold from an Excellent Seller
reviews.review: I thoroughly enjoy the size, versatility, and portability of this product! Easily one of the best handheld devices ever manufactured. Nintendo has completely out classed their competition with this wonderful piece of machinery that is guaranteed to have you busy for hours. And this is coming from a die-hard Sony fan :). The sleek but comfortable design of the joycons makes intense gameplay surprisingly seamless. Their massive game selection ranges from AAA titles, to RPGs, First Person Shooters, and MUCH MORE. There is so much more that could be said, however, it’s too much to type! Lol. If you’re looking for an excellent game console that you can play either casually or continuously, look no further. Additionally, if you’re like me (frugal) and you’re on the fence about shelling out the money, don’t be; it’s worth every penny. Also, this seller moved my shipping up to one day shipping FOR FREE!!! Literally the BEST SELLER I have ever had the pleasure of interacting with. Would definitely order from this seller again. Do yourself a favor and buy the switch!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020
reviews.name: Darla H
reviews.title: Fun, portable, and a step up!
reviews.review: I didn't think I'd like the switch after buying one for my son and seeing him play it. He said he liked it and I was still stuck on my WiiU.However, I'm loving it right now! I love the handheld game that you can take with you if you would like and I love the console that I can play on my big if I'd like a. The only drawback is the little controller holder is quite small said sometimes uncomfortable if you play for extended periods. Other than that, I haven't found a flaw :)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022
reviews.name: Chris GArman
reviews.title: Gift for my husband
reviews.review: My husband was given a switch, but it broke-so I bought this as a replacement.Price was reasonable, and it was delivered as promised.He easily set it up and has been playing his fishing game all day.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.name: Axspointe
reviews.title: Surprisingly good graphics
reviews.review: I finally was able to buy this Nintendo Switch for my kids after weeks of trying. It's really designed well and the graphics are surprisingly good for a portable gaming system. Really impressed. My kids are always fighting to who will use it so at least it's keeping them busy while at home. Wish they had more games available but I'm sure more will come out in the future.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Easily one of the best systems I've ever owned.
reviews.review: The switch is easily one of the best systems I've ever owned because of it's versatility.Nintendo solved the third party game problem for the switch.There are plenty of affordable third party games to play.Some major titles like Mario Kart are forever gonna be 60 bucks and only on sale maybe once a year so there is that to consider.I haven't used it as much on the tv as I have handheld, although docked mode has always been fine every time, it's just there is so much appeal playing games in handheld mode.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.name: Christine Warehime
reviews.title: Make sure everything works and you'll have fun!
reviews.review: The switch is fun, hand held, and has a lot of games to play. The only reason I gave it 3 stars is because we haven't even had it a week and the game docking station doesn't work. We have to wiggle the cords to get the tv connection to work. We have changed the cords and it is definitely the docking station. We had to buy a new one so we could play some awesome games as a family.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.name: Dugan
reviews.title: Scratched screen and defective docking station.
reviews.review: It came scratched and it would not connect with a television.I tried troubleshooting with more than one TV and different HDMI cables, but never had it working with a TV.I tried replacing it, but the replacement got lost in the mail, and our replacement period expired before we knew the replacement was lost.Now we are stuck with a very expensive, lemon.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2020
reviews.name: Apasionado
reviews.title: Great, highly recommend!
reviews.review: Our 4-1/2 year old loves it!!We knew she was a little young for it but she needed something to fill a little time during the day.She stays busy doing activities and school type work but she needed some downtime that wasn’t just watching TV.This is perfect.Paw Patrol game was perfect for her to start learning how to play video games.Since then, she has graduated to a Yoshi game that has her problem solving.She only spends about 30-45 minutes On it a day, total.We also downloaded some coloring books and puzzle games.She loves those.Highly recommend but watch the screen time.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2021
reviews.name: Amanda
reviews.title: Bait and switched
reviews.review: I love the product, I hate that my device is less than a month old and is already breaking. The dock has had dead USB ports since I pulled it from the box and now a fan or something is going out. When I inspected to find the noise source I found tooling marks on the screws that hold the back plate on. It seems I got a refurbished console rather than the new one I paid for. Getting a replacement is impossible thanks to the bottom feeding resellers.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2019
reviews.name: Shanta
reviews.title: Best gift idea ever!
reviews.review: We bought this switch for our daughter for Christmas. Got it early so we can load it up with some cool games before Christmas morning. We are so excited to see her face when she opens this present! Best gift idea ever!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2020
reviews.name: Charles Raggio
reviews.title: Hardware issues - wont read any microSD cards.
reviews.review: We bought this for our son's birthday and we haven't had it for even a year yet and it seems there is a hardware issue. We tried to use three different microSD cards (even the ones manufactured by Nintendo) to add more memory, but none of them worked. Formatting wasn't even an option. We kept getting error messages. I scoured the internet and used every troubleshooting option to no avail. We have only been able to use this Switch very minimally and is now being repaired by Nintendo since it is still under warranty. Also, because of a back up in repairs (due to Covid-19) we won't have it back for a couple months. Wish I could give it a raving review.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
reviews.name: jeremy
reviews.title: pay to play online
reviews.review: why pay to play online? should i pay Nintendo 3 dollars each month to unlock my power button as well?

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
reviews.name: Tiffany
reviews.title: Happy customer
reviews.review: You have the catch amazon because the prices change consistently! After checking 3 times a days for a week i finally caught the price at original price! I received mines today. Brand new. Newer model (-01). Very happy! Shipping was first estimated to be in Oct and after a week my switch was shipped out.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
reviews.name: phackdat
reviews.title: Ninendo have it all except for one thing....
reviews.review: This is my second Nintendo switch for my 2 kids. They get to play together at the same time either on TV or on the switch itself in seperate room. One thing that really makes me upset is the digital/download games. You can't download a game in one console (primary) and download the same game in the other console (different profile/account). Nintendo might have found a loophole to prevent losing more money by forcing people to buy second game for second console. Every game must be purchased two times for both Switches if they want to play together. Overall, Nintendo Switch console is worth it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
reviews.name: brandon
reviews.title: Best Gaming Experience
reviews.review: I have always played Xbox and PC but decided to go and get the switch. It is perfect as I can use it to kill some small down time and have a fun game night with friends and family connected to a TV. I get more joy playing these games than standard shooter or sports games on other consoles since most of the time I play the switch it is with friends which makes it better.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2021
reviews.name: Juan Mosquera
reviews.title: One of my favorite consoles of all time
reviews.review: If your on the fence of getting a switch I highly recommend that you go for it. There is a large assortment of games now In their library. If you can find any communities its also pretty fun. Not to mention they have some of the greatest games of all time whether is BOTW or Animal crossing. This is a must have for kids AND Adults as well.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2020
reviews.name: Luvem
reviews.title: Switch is great
reviews.review: 11-28-20 updated unit to be released next year may want to hold up on buying this. Very fun unit/games... cmon its Nintendo

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.name: CHP Favorite
reviews.title: ANY NINTENDO SWITCH CONSOLE WILL RESTOCK, PLS DONT GIVE-IN TO THE SCALPERS!
reviews.review: Please ONLY buy from Seller Amazon or any other seller that sell at MSRP price and not over outrageous over +$300 price.You are getting the same console nothing extra.Overall this is a very good switch system and i love every min of playing it wherever I go.This new model can also run extra hours compare with the older model.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
reviews.name: Jenny
reviews.title: The best portable gaming device of the 2010s
reviews.review: I bought this for my younger sister as a Christmas present, along with Zelda BoTW and a SanDisk drive. She loves it!! I love how intuitive it is to learn the controls, she had the hang of it in no time, and being able to play looking at the switch screen OR play looking at a monitor/TV is soo nice. The battery life is great too, it charges perfectly fine with a portable charger, or wall charger. Cannot wait to see what Nintendo brings us in the 2020s.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2020
reviews.name: Amanda E. Cain
reviews.title: Continuing Nintendo
reviews.review: I purchase the Nintendo switch for my son for stop Christmas. It has been a great console and he has had a lot of fun interacting on it and taking care of it as well! We have had no issues with it. It has been running great and always remember to make sure it goes in the charging port every night. I have always plug Nintendo and growing up playing it. I am glad to see that they are still switching things up in this new generation. So the counsel can keep going and keep gwtting better!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
reviews.name: Gersica Felli
reviews.title: Great video game
reviews.review: It is pretty easy to install and use. Only downside is the controller. Not the best to play.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.name: GumbyX
reviews.title: Nice upgrade with better battery life over original model
reviews.review: Nice upgrade with better battery life over original model. You might want to get the OLED model as it's $50 more and comes with a bigger screen

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
reviews.name: John
reviews.title: Local Wireless is amazing
reviews.review: The Switch is a very good console and at this point in it's life cycle, there isn't much more to add.I will reinforce that the ability to take the console on the road is fantastic.But my favorite feature by far is the the local wireless option.There is something magical about being able take the console and then play Smash or Mario Kart against your friends while flying!If you can get at the MSRP, highly recommend.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
reviews.name: T
reviews.title: headline
reviews.review: They listed this with a $30 rebate and did not provide it.Joycons are pretty bad, and I'm not sure if pro controller is better, but it would be $70 to find out which is ridiculous.They won't let you go into the shop to see what is on sale without entering your password, which is a pain if it is any good.Games rarely go on sell, and don't do so for much.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2020
reviews.name: Bart
reviews.title: Scored by getting an open box Switch!
reviews.review: I love my Nintendo switch! With new ones not being available I saw this used/open box one on there and thought it was worth a shot. I feel like I really scored on this one. It was pretty much brand new, even the packaging was protecting everything that was in the box wasn’t even disruptive. So if you need one and see a used Prime one available, go for it, for the price you can’t go wrong...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
reviews.name: Behnam Saeedi
reviews.title: Worth the risk!
reviews.review: Buying a $300 item on amazon is terrifying! but this was our Christmas gift for my wife's parent and they loved it! it saved us time at the store and it was the perfect gift for them.- Package arrived on time- Box was well padded with those air bubblies- No fingerprints, scratches or damages anywhere on the packaging or the console- Everything was in place and we are happy customers

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
reviews.name: Will K.
reviews.title: Switch: great way to keep the kids and adults from fighting
reviews.review: Nintendo has done it again. This is a great product with a lot of variety of games including some with motion control. The apps are a bit lacking compared to say the ps4 so don’t expect a web browser or Plex.Breath of the Wild, Super Smash Bro’s and Mario Kart are the definitive titles (sold separately) and they are really fun for all ages. Of course the biggest appeal of the Switch is the ability to go from TV to portable. The best thing is that when the adults are using the TV the kids can still happily play

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2020
reviews.name: dmtd
reviews.title: Got in excellent time, works perfectly
reviews.review: It was so difficult to find the Switch since everyone is stuck at home... this item was supposed to get here between April 1-8 but it got here on March 27!So excited...especially when having an only child stuck in the home for an extended period of time...came w hdmi chord and controller too.Thank you, Thank you!Saved my sanity!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.name: Buyer
reviews.title: Useless product with fake warranty
reviews.review: The display went bad before 1 year when devicewas still under warranty. Even though could not see anything in console it was still pluggable in TV. Could still hear the sound when the display was touched. Sent for repair under warranty. They denied the warranty citing it was power issue (clearly the battery was down) and had water damage. Never buying another Nintendo switch ever.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
reviews.name: yuppyguppypuppy
reviews.title: Christmas gift
reviews.review: No review at this time as I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and boyfriend! Before they got gone!!I will post a review at a later date but what I've read or have been told about this product I may make mother of the year!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
reviews.name: KhaleesiX
reviews.title: Wonderful buy!!
reviews.review: Since the COVID-19 pandemic, Nintendo Switch has been in incredibly high demand. To have been able to purchase one successfully through a reliable seller (Techool (Seller Fulfilled Ships Fast)), is a blessing. It is pricer now but well worth it, especially while playing and staying at home. It arrived new and in perfect condition. Very happy and pleased with my purchase. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2020
reviews.name: Tyler W
reviews.title: Great console if you can get it at regular prices
reviews.review: Best game system for a party environment on the market. Great local multiplayer games for all ages. However it is not worth the money to pay above retail for this. I would wait until it is in stock to purchase one of these at regular retail prices not these bloated resell prices.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
reviews.name: Luckypew
reviews.title: Awesome purchase! No Problems!
reviews.review: The Nintendo switch I ordered came about 2 weeks early from when it was supposed to be originally shipped. It works well and is constantly being played by my girlfriend for hours on end. The battery lasts on its own about 6 to 7 hours and makes it easy to play with the family. Was a very great purchase and we love it!!Pros: EverythingCons: None

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.name: ELI B.
reviews.title: A joy for me
reviews.review: I get new games and play games from when I was a youngster! I also enjoy buying the attachments that's also part of the fun. Got the 512? GIG Card for it. Works very well. Couldn't get it in the store so thank you Amazon.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2022
reviews.name: KisforKismet
reviews.title: The best!
reviews.review: I love this game system. Always been a fan of Nintendo and the Switch is my most favorite system to date. This was well priced, competitive to most sellers like Target and Walmart and even cheaper than some I found.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
reviews.name: L. Fuller
reviews.title: Switch was a GREAT gift!Loves it!
reviews.review: My son absolutely loves his switch! Money well spent.Kids are HARD to entertain these days.I found the switch a great alternative to a number of things he COULD be doing.... drugs, drinking, thuggery.Although at 18 I’m thinking a job might be a good idea.Hard to find work when your skills include; gaming, cuteness, extremely tall, did I mention the gaming?Anyway, at least this keeps him at home, safe and out of trouble.😉

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
reviews.name: trim bush
reviews.title: Portable fun for the whole family.
reviews.review: Fun to play. Charges up fast and last long on the go. Has a good mix of new games and the classic games from nes, super nes and even sega. Available through the Nintendo store for digital download. No need to around cartridges.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.name: xllxDooMxllx
reviews.title: its not worth it
reviews.review: maybe it could compete with ps5 or Xbox s but with metroid 4 not coming out till 2023 its not worth buying and the original Nintendo and Super Nintendo games are not free you have to buy a yearly subscription to play them and no 64 or gamecube or any wii games there remastering them to sell again

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
reviews.name: Evan James
reviews.title: Great system.
reviews.review: Fun to play games on, both on TV and portable.Better to buy digital and not have to keep switching game cartridges, but expensive pricing on Nintendo's store, even on games that are years old.If they lowered the price of games a little, they would destroy the gaming market.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2021
reviews.name: Tara
reviews.title: Switch
reviews.review: Got here but late! For something so expensive and with prime it shouldn’t have been late!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
reviews.name: Clongworth
reviews.title: Son is obsessed
reviews.review: My 10 year old loves this.One of the joy cons quit working but Nintendo fixed it at no charge very quickly and sent it back.Apparently this is a common issue with these.We also had to buy a memory card because it only has enough storage for a few games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2022
reviews.name: jen
reviews.title: Switch
reviews.review: Worked for a while,the cords and gadgets for it didnt,i had to replace them all,now the screen randomly turns a solid color while playing a game and we can't figure out how to fix it

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.name: joseph dye
reviews.title: overpriced for used
reviews.review: why would i pay almost 500 dollars for a used switch when i can go to nintendo's website and buy it brand new for 300

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2020
reviews.name: Uriel Correa
reviews.title: Vale 100 % su compra
reviews.review: Siempre fui #Fan de otras consolas y quería un cambio para complementar mis días libres, al principio dude en comprarlo por la variedad de juegos! sin embargo, cuenta con muchos clásicos y otros nuevos para no perder nunca la diversión.Vale demasiado su compra, que quizá el precio podría ser elevado y sus juegos dependiendo el formato pero la compra lo vale. Si compras los accesorios para viajar y protección del mismo tendrás más comodidad para poder utilizarlo sin ningún problema encualquier lugar y solo o acompañado de gran entretenimiento

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2019
reviews.name: JRS72
reviews.title: Missing part of my order
reviews.review: I ordered using a black friday promo code to receive an amazon gift card with unit. The unit came as advertised in two days but there is not trace of a gift card anywhere. Nintendo's costumer service chat is useless, there is a robot who is supposed to direct your concern to the appropriate department but no one answers.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
reviews.name: KrysWal
reviews.title: Nintendo Switch
reviews.review: My 7 year old son loves this gaming system.Love that you can travel with it or use on the big tv. Can't go wrong with nintendo.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.name: Ruth Depaula
reviews.title: So pissed!! Do not buy it’s used
reviews.review: Mine was definitely not a new one because the controller snapped off easily, don’t buy way too expensive I contacted the person that sells it and he said that I can send it back and he will check if it was accidental and if it was they don’t replace it, obviously it will look accidental it snapped off, I can’t believe I fell for this crap, I should of tested it earlier before wrapping it and giving as a gift to my son for Christmas! I am beyond pissed I spent 444 dollars for this crap used thing, and they claim it’s brand new! Oh please it was glued back in!!! I’m not wasting my time sending it back to not get a replacement or my money back!!!!! 😡

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
reviews.name: Timothy George Long II
reviews.title: Suffering
reviews.review: If you get one for your wife or girlfriend just be prepared to suffer...lonely...suffering.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.name: Kat
reviews.title: Perfect experience
reviews.review: I was worried about a lot of things purchasing this based on other reviews. Let me tell you my experience. I received the correct model # (you’ll see this before you even open the box). I I received the correct American cables. Everythingcame in the package. The controllers were NOT loose. I was able to connect to wifi and connect this to my smart TV. Do not buy this product if it’s over $299.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
reviews.name: cesar rojas
reviews.title: Purchase this gift brand new ! Is gaving erro day can't connect to wifi
reviews.review: Purchase this item for birthday gift, I was expecting to be brand new ! And maybe refurbished or repaired keep getting messga saying can't connect to wifi..I have related reset and continue have even been able to.use...have also look helpful video on YouTube and problem continue! Spent $350 to get overnight being amzon prime member! Customer service has not been able to fix or refund telling me to contact ninetodo! Thank for stealing my money!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.name: Jose Arturo
reviews.title: Good quality but not a good platform for all games
reviews.review: Do not buy it unless you are in love with Nintendo. The product is well built, but the conasole is limited to certain game companies. You do not have access to all EA games. In this case PlayStation and Xbox are better consoles.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.review: I had never played an Animal Crossing game before, but after seeing all of the trailers, I knew I had to have it.I used NowInStock's website to get the red and blue for MSRP about 2 months ago, and have been having a blast with it ever since.My boyfriend liked it so much he got one from GameStop about 3 weeks ago.We could not be happier!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.name: Vanessa Flores
reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review: I bought this as a christmas present and started using it at the beginning of January. After almost a month, it's still working well. The actual product was packaged well; it just came in a really beat-up box. Hoping that won't affect the life of it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020
reviews.name: Emily
reviews.title: Dopeee
reviews.review: It's as amazing as the hype makes it. But don't go overpaying $600 for it. Wait til it's back in stock $299.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.name: Ginny Compton
reviews.title: I HATE it
reviews.review: I bought this for my husband for his birthday and he just loves it! He’s on it constantly.I hate it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
reviews.name: D. Kramer
reviews.title: Nice but not everything I purchased is there
reviews.review: Nice product, however I purchased on black Friday with code for a free $25 gift card. I have received no such card, and now I don't see any notion that I purchased with the code.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
reviews.name: Weston Papes
reviews.title: I'm Disgusted.
reviews.review: Honestly, the nerve of you people who are charing so much above retail value. I get it, people are stuck at home and want a Switch. But you are SO DAMN WRONG if you think I or anyone else will pay $100 or over asking price from stores for a console. I hope you can sleep well with yourself, because you people honestly kill me.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2019
reviews.name: Antonio Stevenson
reviews.title: $300 for something Nintendo KNOWS doesnt work
reviews.review: Just like so many others, the left Joy Con died. Took about a week. Get a PlayStation or Xbox unless you like spending $300 on something that doesnt work and the company thats selling it KNOWS its selling you garbage

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022
reviews.name: Ash
reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
reviews.review: This was horrible decision on my part. It crashed the first day, wouldn’t charge on the dock or turn on after I loaded my son’s account onto the switch. It’s awful trying to return the system, instead of being able to print a label and mail it back yourself, ohhhh no. You have to request return, and UPS must come pick it up from YOU while at HOME. Successfully did this though, and still haven’t received the refund yet (sent back 4 weeks ago).

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: This is for a Used Switch
reviews.review: I was under the impression that Amazon was selling me a brand new switch for full price that Nintendo sells. I wish I would have taken a picture of the packaging and how jumbled it was in the box prior to my 8 year old tearing it open. This is a used switch. Two profiles are already stored on this switch and language was set to Spanish. Would have expected from a 3rd party seller but not Amazon.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.name: Frau B
reviews.title: Stopped working after six months.
reviews.review: This is the second time I've bought a nintendo switch. The first one at least lasted a few years before the battery stopped working and it became unable to turn on, the second one only lasted six months before shutting down permanently without explanation. An extremely expensive product made of the cheapest materials available. Ninety day coverage isn't enough for a product designed to brick itself after half a year.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
reviews.name: Ryan
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: Absolute blast of a system. It is a genius design and the games are fun. I love table top mode where I can play Super Smash Brothers with other people or Mario party. It is a 3 in 1. A home console for the TV, a portable gaming device, and mini TV in itself. Not the most powerful console but it is definitely one of my favorites due to its features, comfort, and games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.name: William B. Wade Jr.
reviews.title: Easy to set up for use
reviews.review: This was a gift for my daughter . . . It came with all needed to hook up and begin playing the games (separately purchased) and an expansion storage card which would enable the ability to download further online games when hooked up to the internet.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
reviews.name: Maria
reviews.title: No me gusto la precentacion del paquete o llego c
reviews.review: No llego con su empaque, todo en bolsas separada en una caja del correo, y sin ninguna guia.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2020
reviews.name: Steven Zych
reviews.title: Came Early!
reviews.review: I order the Nintendo Switch on December 2nd. It was expected to be here after Christmas but it arrived on December 8th! The product says “In stock on” and then a date. When I ordered it said December 30. The Nintendo Switch came with everything it is supposed to (everything is in a plastic bag except the dock which was in bubble wrap) and came in the Nintendo Switch box. If you’re looking for a Switch that isn’t overpriced, I recommend buying this one! In the pictures, I’ve already unwrapped some items in the box.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.name: Neil
reviews.title: At 55, I'm too old for this
reviews.review: I was hoping for some fun nostalgia gaming.What I found is more nonsense and upsells than fun.I also learned you can buy game add-ons for games you don't own through confusing ads.Oh, and no returns. All sales final.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
reviews.name: jamie
reviews.title: Great for any age!
reviews.review: Love this! I hate video games yet I have played and actually enjoy it! I bought for my 12 year old daughter but had to buy 2 more controllers as my 3 and 4 year old boys play as well! Didn’t think they would be able to but they love it and actually comprehend how to play! Great game for the family and for all ages! Little kids and adults! Even my mom (grandma) played along!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.name: Jose Roberto Viquez Villalobos
reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse rocks!
reviews.review: I got one from amazon warehouse used-good and I had my doubts, when it came it was repackaged but new :DI recommend giving second life to some articles.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.name: Evan
reviews.title: You can’t get Netflix or Disney or any good apps.
reviews.review: I went to the switch from Xbox and it’s the worst transition ever. Online play looks terrible. You can’t get Netflix or Disney plus or browse the web. You can get Hulu but you can buy a smart tv for the price and have Hulu and 4 k. The streaming from Hulu has been seamless. The joy con controllers feel weird and the thumb sticks are in inappropriate places for easy and well controlled play. I would never buy. Someone plz trade me their Xbox.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2022
reviews.name: Robert Brown
reviews.title: Amazing console
reviews.review: Switch has been absolutely great for my family of 6. Great party games. Great co-op games. Great individual games. Games for young and old. My family highly recommends

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.name: Martin S
reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.review: Now I No longer have to share with my kids. If I want to kick back & relax for a little while by playing a game, I now can.Lots of fun.Well made unit.Very happy with the Nintendo Switch!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
reviews.name: scott bowman
reviews.title: Over priced but works great and is tons of fun
reviews.review: I had been trying to find a switch ever since quarantine hit, but they were sold out everywhere. This one was about $400 after taxes and shipping, so it was overpriced $100 but it works great and was a lot easier than finding one on offer up. On top of that my delivery was super quick. I would have grave them 5 stars if it wasn't for the price gouge, regardless was worth it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Defective; immediately returned
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch that I purchased arrived today and unfortunately, was returned today due to it being defective. It was advertised as a Nintendo Switch in brand new condition. However, the error code that displayed on the screen upon turning it on indicated otherwise. I called Nintendo to troubleshoot, but the switch was so defective that while trouble shooting it completely shut off and wouldn’t turn back on – not even to display the error code. The Nintendo representative assumed that I had this switch for quite some time because these are issues that any “brand new” switch shouldn’t have.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
reviews.name: Mahala Gaines
reviews.title: Missing console and Remote
reviews.review: Just got the Switch in the mail a minute ago, and there's no console or remote in the box. It seems like it has everything else, but now I can't play my game for another week while I wait for a return to go through. How did no one notice these were missing?!? Does no one check this kind of stuff?

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.name: Gravestone
reviews.title: Worth the money, and lots of fun to be had.
reviews.review: Really well designed, sturdy and very fun to play solo or with my wife and kid. Mario Kart 8 I think we are up to now and loads of nostalgic fun.
