I 3d printed handheld controller grips for when we use the joycons for two players separately! Much more comfortable with big hands than holding the single joycon sideways. Really happy all around with the Switch.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
reviews.name: Joshua Berkovitz
reviews.title: The BEST video Game Handheld I have ever owned
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch Handheld is the BEST game unit I have ever owned.My entire family is having lots of usage and fu with it.It is a fantastic game to take with you during travel or play at home.great variety of games are available for all ages from Nintendo.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
reviews.name: Daniel M Coughlin
reviews.title: It’s the switch, what more can I say? A good console, and handheld.
reviews.review: Everything is in perfect order when it arrived. Though I didn’t know it would have to be charged upon arrival. Was looking forward to playing it as soon as everything was hooked up to the television, but I had to use handheld mode which made it die while setting up! Minor gripes aside, it’s a great console. We all know this. $20 for the worst online gaming service on the market is a bit much for me though.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Zero Stars. Long wait for replacement of broken item
reviews.review: Can't get past the first set up screen because the switch won't recognize the left joycon,even my friends joycon that is definitely working. I called Nintendo to troubleshoot and they told me to return it through who I bought it from because their repairs are 6-8 weeks. I have been excitedly waiting for this to be delivered and now I won't receive a replacement from Amazon for over a month! Am going to see if I can purchase this from somewhere other than Amazon before this because I am so disappointed.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
reviews.name: Lydia G.
reviews.title: Love this
reviews.review: I love this switch. I researched a lot before buys, and I am not sure if there is a drastic difference in the red box and white box battery life. All I know it, make sure you charge it when not in use or your switch will be dead.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.name: TR
reviews.title: My son loves it
reviews.review: Got this as a gift for my son. The consel itself is good my son loves it. However the nintendo switch shop membership is pointless and the games are crazy expensive for what they are. I'm not sure I would buy it again. 4bstars cause to my 9yr old it's amazing

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
reviews.name: محمد
reviews.title: Scam
reviews.review: I got everything except the real console

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2020
reviews.name: NCB
reviews.title: Best gaming experience
reviews.review: While technologically inferior to the other 2 consoles of this gen, the Switch is hands down the most fun of them all. There are just a gazillion games available and the ability to seamlessly switch from docked mode to portable mode is just priceless. Nothing can beat being able to play your favorite games anywhere you want. Definitely a must buy.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
reviews.name: W
reviews.title: Fun
reviews.review: Unboxing was a little weird because I didn’t have instructions within the box for the gaming system but other than that I absolutely love this device. Very fun to play solo and with friends and family!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2022
reviews.name: Heather Greer
reviews.title: Good purchase
reviews.review: I was worried about ordering a switch online and not picking it up in-store, but so far, so good! Everything was packaged nicely, and all the accessories came with it. I had it up and running within 45 minutes and downloaded multiple games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2020
reviews.name: David
reviews.title: Great combo for home and travel.
reviews.review: I got this for my son who is 6. He loves playing it and so do I. The system is amazing in so many ways of using it. Very easy and quick to set up. Easy and quick to switch from TV playing to the Switch console without losing your points in the game. Work great with the internet. The battery life is better than the old version. We really enjoy it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.name: Louis
reviews.title: Glare when playing with it outdoors
reviews.review: There’s a glare when you play it outside or bright surroundings, then having to increase the brightness to see better and less time playing due to discharging the battery quicker.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020
reviews.name: Maite
reviews.title: My kid loves this
reviews.review: My daughter asked for this as a Christmas gift. It's easy to set up an account and download the games. I preferred this method instead of buying cartridges. For her convenience, I bought a memory card. She uses the device when we travel, have to use waiting rooms, or similar activities. She can also invite a friend to play since each can use a control, or whatever it's called.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.name: Leslie R.
reviews.title: Good System
reviews.review: The system came new, packaged great. No issues. Perfect condition and playability. We have been Nintendo buyers since the beginning. We like the family-friendly games that Nintendo offers. The travel ability of this system is also a plus. Everyone in the house loves it. We range from 4 to 46.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
reviews.name: NTerry
reviews.title: Awesome system.
reviews.review: I love this little game system. I can take it with me on the go or play it on my tv. I’m happy with my purchase. If you’re looking for games for it buy them off of Amazon. No store at all had the options like on Amazon. Just a heads up.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
reviews.name: Lily's mom
reviews.title: Great birthday present
reviews.review: The switch lite made my kid's eye really tired so we got this. Hopefully this is easier on eyes. Kids are happy playing zelda.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.name: michael
reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.review: Almost twice the amount of the MSRP. You're a fraud and should be put in prison for taking innocent people's money. Like wtf dude c'mon.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
reviews.name: Nick T
reviews.title: Great product. But buy a case and a micro SD
reviews.review: Great product. Ordered it in the morning, 5 hours later was at my door. We live in beautiful times.Definitely recommend getting a Switch with colored joycons like this one, the black ones are dull and these Red/Blue ones retail for up to $80. Comes with everything you need except a carry case (which I would recommend instead of putting in your backpack lose) as well as picking up a good sized Micro SD card. I got like a 200gb one for $30-40 so I will never lose one of the tiny came cartridges.It's light weight and feels a little fragile, but not cheap feeling. Just wouldn't recommend dropping it like EVER. Anyway, great for all ages like 8-99yo. Bright screen, kick stand is a pain to open at first, but I've used that part like 2 times in 3 months.All n' all, would recommend!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2021
reviews.name: Carolyn
reviews.title: Got mine refurbished
reviews.review: Got it from a third party seller, and they were great! Arrived on time with very thick packaging (so glad they were so diligent), and the switch works great! You can tell some of the buttons they had to fix, but I am totally okay with that, considering it wasn't full-price. It's been a reliable little machine, and loads of fun!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2019
reviews.name: jason ellsworth
reviews.title: not new used
reviews.review: it works but was supposed to be new but came with a account already on it and perental lock already on it so couldnt play one of my games until we called nintendo and they had to help us unlock it

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.name: olivia cappuzzo
reviews.title: Works beautifully!
reviews.review: There was no damage to the box or the console. I bought it used so I was surprised when it came in the factory packaging! Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.name: Cianna
reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review: The only reason this has one star reviews is because of the price of it but you got to think this is an actual console so I think the price is worth it especially for what I needed and it runs good I just wished the battery would last a little bit longer

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2019
reviews.name: Pavel K.
reviews.title: I like playing in handheld mode!
reviews.review: Battery life is really extended, it later about 5 hours in Zelda

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.name: no doubt
reviews.title: Are You SERIOUS
reviews.review: just got this Nintendo switch today, the blue controller non functioning.. had to send the blue controller to nintendo , had to pay 5.97 out of our pocket to get it there so they could FIX our brand new controller.. went ahead and ordered new controllers while we have to wait to have our brand new controller fixed.. PISSED.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
reviews.name: Luigi
reviews.title: The console is great, the controls not so much
reviews.review: The console works like a charm, the games are really good but the controls stick and keep shifting to opposite sides. I have opened a ticket with Nintendo to repair but I've this console for less than 6 months.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
reviews.name: JeanBean
reviews.title: Buy it when the price is 299.99
reviews.review: Been watching the prices for a while and it took a while but it eventually did go back to normal. Don't feed the scalpers. Just be patient.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.name: Rich
reviews.title: Great console overall but watch out for the price gouging
reviews.review: I personally don't get it but my daughter loves it I did have a problem just a few months into the purchase with one of the rails but I ordered them replace them myself and she's back to having the great time with the console

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.name: Tiger100M
reviews.title: Double Fun!
reviews.review: I am more of a video gamer who connects consoles to the television, but this system does both. The games to play are a lot fun, mostly with other people.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.name: Christine Benjamin
reviews.title: 💕 She Loves it! 💕
reviews.review: My 13 year old is in love.I enjoy seeing her like this.She plays at night and on weekends.She is happy, it's worth the price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.name: JanetMH
reviews.title: missing part
reviews.review: Missing the AC adapter.We got the unit to charge with antoher cord however to hook up tot he TV it is requiring the origianl AC adapter cord.I am still on hold wiith Nintendo.Won't return this, like Amazon would like, this for a new one due to lead times.Dissapointed. Still on hold with Nintendo...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
reviews.name: Candy
reviews.title: The switch is not new as described
reviews.review: Received the item on time but the box was opened. It looked like the switch was already used

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020
reviews.name: Tahlula
reviews.title: Trust this seller!
reviews.review: My 9 y.o. granddaughter has received this Nintendo Switch as a combination early Easter gift and a staying at home try not to get too bored gift. She absolutely loves it!The seller shipped this and we received it so quickly. I would recommend this seller anytime.This product works great!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.name: Natalie H.
reviews.title: Fun game console for everyone!
reviews.review: Love this! Such a great buy and it was supposed to be here later this week but I got it earlier than expected! Super interactive and I’m excited to play some games with friends! We bought to extra controllers so we can have game nights

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.name: alyssa bkue
reviews.title: Used- very good from Amazon warehouse, pleasently surprised
reviews.review: Bought this switch used-very good from Amazon warehouse and it came in looking essentially new. I could not tell that anyone had ever used it before and am very happy with the purchase. I put it in a case immediately without really thinking of taking pictures for this review and don't want to take it out so I attached a picture of it in the case. I didn't see any physical wear and it was definitely worth it for the price (it came with everything and in the original box)

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: For Xmas for my Grandkids
reviews.review: I bought this for my Grandkids for Xmas, so happy I got today!! Thanks Amazon as always.This is what they wanted.I will update after Christmas.I love gaming stations.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.name: Erick
reviews.title: Amazing and addictive
reviews.review: I love this thing so much. Had to wait months for it to be back in stock. Best portable console ive used so far. Highly recommend for individuals and families

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
reviews.name: Erin R
reviews.title: Excellent shipping
reviews.review: This was a gift for my brother. Was happily surprised when I bought it on back order and it arrived a month before expected, in time for the holidays. So that was pretty awesome. Also it keeps him quiet (he's 20). Same price as everyone else.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.name: Kataz5
reviews.title: When it works right it's great...
reviews.review: This is the second Switch. The first one was not new. I was sent a used system at new purchase price.Anyway, this one is new, however, I am going to have to contact Nintendo because the left Joy Con doesn't hold a charge right and it also doesn't always move right. 😠 Getting fed up with such an expensive toy having such problems.Buyer beware. It is a fun thing when it works right.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.name: Vanessa Walker
reviews.title: Disappointed customer
reviews.review: This product worked fine until this past August, it just stopped working. Purchased it November 10, 2021 for Xmas for my granddaughter. When I tried to use the protection plan they gave me such a hard time. Now I purchased another one to avoid the hassle of trying to get the other one fixed. These games are not cheap and I had to pay 79 dollars so that she would have it before Xmas.Disappointed customerVanessa Walker

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.name: eekaypeep
reviews.title: Misleading & disappointing
reviews.review: Beware American shoppers. This product came only with a European power cord so my family in the US was unable to use it on Christmas Day. There was no mention of this in the description but needless to say it caused huge disappointment. Amazon and the vendor should be ashamed of misleading customers

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019
reviews.name: Allen Mayberry
reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: Bought this for the Mrs. for an early Christmas present directly from Amazon. It is the new version with extended battery life. We’ve been taking turns playing Breath of the Wild for hours on end. No complaints whatsoever. Except maybe that I prefer my Xbox controller which can work on it with the Brooks adapter (also on Amazon).

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.name: Duyen
reviews.title: Too perfect
reviews.review: I show my love through material items, my boyfriend really wanted a switch and that was really all he wanted so I looked everywhere for days since it was sold out everywhere. I have finally found it and bought it for him but now he’s on that dang switch more than being aware of real work surroundings. Works too well i guess. Other than my personal experience, it was packaged well and everything no damage.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
reviews.name: wen
reviews.title: super fun with family highly recommend
reviews.review: We were supposed to get the switchin October, but we didn't expect them to arrive so soon. I can buy it on 299.99, which makes me very happy. Several friends around me bought it around 370. Both of us are Nintendo fans and that keeps us from stopping to play games.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
reviews.name: Chris Gibson
reviews.title: Good product but weird promo offer
reviews.review: The product seems pretty good so far. Smaller than I thought as I had never actually seen the device, but the screen is clear, and the first game we bought (Mario karts) had fantastic clear graphics.Controllers are very small and awkward. We might get the more traditional controllers to replace the funny little joy cons.This offer came with a $30 credit that was not applied at delivery. Not sure why they couldn’t just discount it at purchase. So inevitably it went wrong and I needed to complain - hence dropping a few stars. Now I have a promotional credit that can be applied to eligible items but doesn’t appear on my account. So basically, don’t get too excited about the promo offer as it is super painful to get the money.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.name: Rickyandcoco
reviews.title: Rickyandcoco
reviews.review: Never it used again not like close a new nintendoswitchat all@ $30 buy new systemsin boxI did at I did used systemsright did not work never be happythere used systems

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.name: Janny
reviews.title: Nintendo Switch
reviews.review: When the host is connected to the remote control, the up, down, left and right keys are normal.When the game console is connected to the TV, the handle program will become confusing and imperfect.I need to buy an additional gamepad.Not satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020
reviews.name: Michael Maxon
reviews.title: Great device with nice features and good feel.
reviews.review: Bought the Switch for my wife for Xmas.She hooked it up to the tv and was playing Zelda and Tetris and whatnot.I noticed the graphics clarity and great sound.The device feels solid and the controls are well made.Very nice gift.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
reviews.name: Dana
reviews.title: Freezes often
reviews.review: Loved it when it arrived, unfortunately keeps freezing. I am returning it today. I could see once in awhile not twice a week every week or sometimes more. Paid $500, definitely not worth it with issues it's having. Extremely disappointed because my boy really loves it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.name: Jeanelle W
reviews.title: Don’t buy for husbands
reviews.review: 4 stars because it needs to remind the user to take a break, ya know like the wii did. Seriously my husband needs a reminder to pay attention to his wife and his home. He absolutely loves it so its gotta be pretty great.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
reviews.name: Russell
reviews.title: Don't feed the monster
reviews.review: PLEASE don't buy the switch above the MSRP! These jerks are creating a vacuum for the Nintendo Switch and then scalping them for profit! A sad world we live in these days when a GLOBAL pandemic should be bringing us all together and instead these bottom feeders see it as an opportunity to feast on the wants / needs of others. Disgusting!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
reviews.name: Brandon Yee
reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.review: I got this because of the shelter in place. I bought Pokemon Sword first. It's my first system where I am able to play handheld, tabletop or on my T.V. The joycons are very responsive. I haven't had drifting and I hope not yet. I get quite a few hours of gaming from this system before I need to charge. I like playing online with my friends. This system doesn't have to have to have the best-looking games, but it wins out in story and versatility.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.name: Erich Pearson
reviews.title: Not for US consumers?!
reviews.review: Imagine our surprise this Christmas morning when the kids opened up their overpricedNintendo Switch...and the charger was not intended for a US outlet. I am so, so grateful that we took our first trip to Europe a year ago, and happened to have a converter buried in the junk drawer. Because those shrieks of joy would have quickly...well, we’ll just say they would have gone in the other direction.Maybe this was a fluke, but something to watch for.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.name: Mesheika Roper
reviews.title: My son really loved his gift, now its placed in a corner
reviews.review: Bought it for my son's Birthday and it was well appreciated and brought tears of joy to his eyes. However, it also brought tears to his when the blue joy stick stop working. Now I'm going to have to be doing replacement.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2021
reviews.name: Dennis M.
reviews.title: Not as described.
reviews.review: No where in the description did I read it was used. I received it in a box that was not original. All components are there but in an Amazon box - not the Nintendo box.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019
reviews.name: Suman
reviews.title: Single controller with no single game on it
reviews.review: I was expecting a single game with the bundle but looks like it’s only console with one controller... how we need to suppose to play with two persons.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.name: MD
reviews.title: A perfect present!
reviews.review: I bought this as a present for my niece and she loves it, as do I. This is the first video game system that I have played since the Nintendo Wii. The graphics and motion controls have gotten so much better since then! We love playing games like animal crossing, Ring FIt, and Legend of Zelda! It has been a lot of fun to get back into video gaming and introduce video gaming to my niece as this is her first system. I'm very happy I bought this.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
reviews.name: Janet McKenner
reviews.title: Fun for all
reviews.review: My senior husband has never played a game on a device. Got it to play with grandson. Has fun by himself too and is learning Super Mario. Good for all ages and abilities.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.name: Anthony
reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review: Very simple to use and setup. Love the portability and ease of use. So easy my 3 year old plays games. Also you can't beat the price for a year's membership.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
reviews.name: Matt Kendall
reviews.title: Whats not to love?
reviews.review: Great product and made for a very happy kiddo on Christmas morning! Some great throwback games like Tecmo Bowl and all the Mario's that are fun and take me right back to 1989 when I had my original NES! Great system!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.name: Stash
reviews.title: Side controls dont slide on and off easily.
reviews.review: The controllers that connect to the side of device feel cheap and don't slide on and off easily like other switches that I've used. I am sometimes scared that it will break. Otherwise, the console works great and is easy to set up. I had to buy a seperate controller though because of the issue.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.name: Jennifer Kay Rohrs
reviews.title: Great product, but could be better here and there!
reviews.review: The product is pretty good, but there are some things I think Nintendo could have done better. I think Nintendo could have marketed this to an older audience, because there are some features, such as Netflix and other things of the like that are not available. My hands are also way to big for the controller, when I’m not playing it fully in handheld mode. Some parts feel cheap, such as the stand on the back. Also, the screen feels very cheap, and can scratch very easily. It’s definitely good, but could be better here and there.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.name: Teri
reviews.title: Buyer be ware!
reviews.review: Ordered thinking it included the game console.It does not.Finally allowed me to return, if I pay shipping and restocking fee.Total cost to look at this item was over $100.Don't do it!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.name: Cas
reviews.title: It’s great and I’m gay
reviews.review: I love it so much and I’m sitting between two of my partners and we’re all gay and we all like Animal Crossing!!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.name: Amber
reviews.title: So fun
reviews.review: I bought this for my son and now I want one. These things are amazing. Perfect condition. Great quality.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2020
reviews.name: Madison Clapp (Maddy)
reviews.title: No extra things.
reviews.review: I love it! It came with exactly everything I wanted. I also got my account back on my switch from my family's switch. It doesn't come with a screen protector or extra stuff to let you know. They protected the console really well it was wrapped up in so much bubble wrap.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.name: Nic
reviews.title: Love this with Ring Adventure!
reviews.review: Only disappointed I waited so long to buy. I love this along with Ring Adventure so much. I am single adult who uses it daily! Amazing and fun workout. I am recommending to all my friends!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
reviews.name: Brandy Teeters
reviews.title: Dont believe lies it is perfect
reviews.review: I did in fact get the new one it was unopened and unused when I received it, have had no trouble out of it so far. I love this system.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.name: Destiny
reviews.title: Waste
reviews.review: Don't waste your money on this. The console absolutely sucks. Buy a different game system because this is not it. Very dissapointed at how much money I wasted on this...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.name: Esem
reviews.title: Love the Nintendo Switch
reviews.review: This was a gift for my grandson, absolutely the only thing he wanted. He was and is delighted with his Nintendo Switch. He can play alone or with others and there are so many games to choose from.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2021
reviews.name: victoria petrizzi
reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
reviews.review: Absolutely unreal... this came used with dirty cords, remnants of sticker peeled off in USPS box. The audacity of this company to advertise this as a new in box Nintendo Switch for FULL price. This is a Christmas gift for my son, thank goodness I opened the packaging before it was too late.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.name: forzaurus
reviews.title: Great console and handheld!
reviews.review: Love the console and all the games. Nintendo is great and their IP makes a huge difference. A lot of nostalgia and new experiences make this my favorite console in many years.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.name: Tee Bee
reviews.title: Arrived on time
reviews.review: Came on time box was prefect and everything inside this made a very happy 8 year old oChristmas day .

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.name: eugene vazquez
reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.review: Nice size screen. Very clear picture for a portable unit. Even better when you dock it to your T.V. Also, the controllers are very responsive,and have rumble, also..overall, a very good system!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.name: Granite
reviews.title: Gift
reviews.review: Purchased as a guft.Arrived earlier than originally forecast and has been functioning fine since installed.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.name: Isaac Gage
reviews.title: Great Gaming System
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch is a great gaming system. The interface is user friendly and the wide variety of games available means there is something for everyone. Would definitely recommend this system for people of all ages.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.name: Adam
reviews.title: Good Value - Good Console
reviews.review: I love it for on the go gaming. The games are good and the battery life is incredible. However, Nintendo really only sells a couple of genres and a lot of the games are self-similar.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2019
reviews.name: Pengy
reviews.title: System itself is great. Kickstand, dock, and grip could be way better.
reviews.review: Good battery life, nice screen. The kickstand is very flimsy, and the dock is way too large to be portable.Grip is the worst thing about this system, both when using it in handheld mode and a single joycon.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2019
reviews.name: Andres Espinoza
reviews.title: Having so much fun!
reviews.review: The ordered was delivered as promised. The product comes with the dock, the joy-cons, cables and accessories to play. The Nintendo Switch is just a great hybrid console, having so much fun with it. The screen looks better that the last one. The joy-cons are working without any problem, been playing for about 40 hours now without any issues on the console or any part, if something goes wrong will update this info.Nintendo has a huge library now and since the PS5 and Scarlett come next year, they are like transitioning, this is maybe the best time to get a Nintendo Switch.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
reviews.name: Franklin Midence
reviews.title: Better than I expected for this quarantine.
reviews.review: I got a huge lucky because was 300 usb the Nintendo Switch (+17 bucks from taxes), was brand new and is the 2019 version, HAC-001(-01) in the red box... for those that want to buy the Nintendo switch I recommend to wait because is hard to get one Nintendo Switch at 300 usb, all of them are 350+ usb and that's expensive and not worth it, I just got a good lucky for it when Amazon put it in the store... Thanks Amazon.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: This was a huge hit
reviews.review: This is a huge hit with my 11 yr old son. It’s his very first video game set up. My wife and I have have been careful to not raise our kids as video game kids. So with this being our sons first unit. It comes highly recommended.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2021
reviews.name: Wahine
reviews.title: Only had it two days!
reviews.review: Clearly has someone’s initials scratched into the back of it and the back case doesn’t sit flush against the rest of the device(missing screws as well). Fan runs very loud when being played.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review: Great product.The connection for one of the joy cons is broken now after a year and a half but my son was rough with it at times.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.name: Ren
reviews.title: Best thing to treat yourself with.
reviews.review: As someone who plays games almost 24/7 and now on the go basically? I love the switch. It didn't appear with scratches and it was carefully handled. So very appreciated.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020
reviews.name: Taylor
reviews.title: COVID Lifeline
reviews.review: Harmony knew our 4 young kids needed this just before COVID broke out.Not sure what we would have done without it...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2020
reviews.name: Cassandra Olea
reviews.title: Fun for all even those that say they don't like games
reviews.review: Love that we can play it on the big screen amd then take it on the go. The game options are great for all levels of gaming especially for me as a mother who doesn't care for many games. Love that it is multiplayer. Only complaint is the joy stickes eventually wear out and need to replace the controller. Other then that its recommended to all.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.name: Kyla Epp
reviews.title: Legit
reviews.review: Came fast and was 100% legit brand new nothing had been opened before was packaged super well. I Was a little anxious buying such an expensive electronic online like this but it was amazing,was a vday present for my hubby and he was thrilled!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
reviews.name: Daisy G
reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review: I purchase this switch for almost half a month. Since the COVID, I have to stay at home and try to do exercise at home. I never played before, but Switch had many different exercise games. My roommates and I use it to play games everyday!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Best gift for the wife
reviews.review: I bought this for my wife’sbirthdayit’s been the best gift ever I haven’t seen her since.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.name: Mike M
reviews.title: Controller keeps lagging out
reviews.review: This product is obviously made very cheap. The controller stops connecting I requested they send me a controller that actually works but they’d rather take the controller in to a repair shop to look at it. I’m sure it cost them $2 to make these controllers and up sell it for about $30-$40 so for $300 just buy an actual gaming console

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.name: Teresa Anne
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review: My kids, my husband, heck even me (the mom) love this system. We have so much fun together as a family. I wish it came with some games though. Overall love it and would recommend!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
reviews.name: LynHuston
reviews.title: Gramma playing nintendo games
reviews.review: My new hobby yay

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021
reviews.name: Jade Hiebert
reviews.title: Always good but...
reviews.review: LOVE IT. Always a blast to play. My only take away is that since I've received it, the left joy con always slides out of place even though it clicked in place. It does it on all attachments as well. Doesn't effect how it plays but still a little annoying

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.name: Scott
reviews.title: Nice a portable.
reviews.review: My daughter loves this as it can be played like a real console on the TV or removed and played as a handheld device. I did have the dock stop working randomly and had to send it to Nintendo to be repaired. I had the console only a month before the dock stopped charging and broadcasting the switch to the TV.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
reviews.name: Carlos Caballero
reviews.title: Great console!
reviews.review: Switch works great! , very good battery life and clean performance, only issue ive had twice is that the control unsynced randomly and i had to attach the joycons manually to keep up with the online game i was in, detached a second later and it would lose sync, on both ocasions i had to restart the game

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great product, odd power cord
reviews.review: Product works fine and all the accessories were in the box. However, I had to order a new power cord because the one included was a Euro version with a cheap US adapter that did not fit properly causing it to become disconnected easily. A bit dissappointing and frustrating for usage.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.name: Astrom
reviews.title: Happy
reviews.review: Received my switch in a timely manner. Everything was there and works well.I couldn't find my ac adapter, contacted the seller saying it didn't come with one. Seller responded right away. However, I did find it. It had fallen between the couch and the wall. Very impressed with the quick response.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2021
reviews.name: Ryan Foster
reviews.title: Upset
reviews.review: I bought this on March and gave it to my son in April.It was supposed to be new yet there were games that had been downloaded and played on it.I really hope that it hunt been already worn out.I'm super disapointed.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.name: Jessica
reviews.title: Broken within a month
reviews.review: I am pretty sure it was broken when they sent it to me and then it started giving me the orange screen and freezing. It was so upsetting because I waited for this switch and then it’s broken and I was so excited about it

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
reviews.name: Florida Maggie
reviews.title: Great game device.
reviews.review: Bought for my 10 year old grandson for Christmas. He quickly learned the controls...and is having great fun.The games are a bit expensive but necessary. The quality seems excellent.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
reviews.name: Chris
reviews.title: Battery Drain
reviews.review: Battery drains a lot when not in use. Requires a battery charge whenever fully charged and not used for a couple days.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.name: Mary A. Irwin
reviews.title: Still not here!
reviews.review: Still not here. I got an email that a shipping label had been produced but it's still not anywhere to be found!!!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
reviews.name: Yang
reviews.title: Best game console for family with little kids
reviews.review: My son is in lower grade of elementary school. Nintendo switch is the best game console for us because many games for kids are exclusive on Nintendo. The console can be used for TV projection or hand hold so it is good for both home and travel. The battery life is good too.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.name: Crystal franco
reviews.title: Super Mario and the bad FPS
reviews.review: Meh. I had initially got the switch for acnh but now to think of this it is kind of a waste. Unless you want to play only mario type of games then get it. And even then the microphone situation sucks. You have to download an app for specific voice chats such as acnh. Splatoon. Etc. the joycons are sensitive and will break if not under special care. And overall this system does not even have good fps. This is a fossil in Living time

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.name: Audrey Rain
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review: Omg, I always wanted a switch asked for one for Christmas never got it but I bought it, opened it and it's exactly the product I wanted. It didn't come with the original box but it's fine and if you think it comes with animal crossing you need to read the description because it said no where about animal crossing.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.name: Patrick J
reviews.title: Works great! Would recommend
reviews.review: Came in better condition than anticipated in the description!! No original packaging but that didn’t matter to me as all the parts were there. Was delivered with care. This is almost perfect condition better than expected and works perfectly. Not to mention it wasn’t price gouged which is a PLUS. The only flaw mentioned was where it laid on a conveyer belt you can see tiny black scuffs. Again, that didn’t matter at all. It’s perfect. Thank you!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2020
reviews.name: Peter D
reviews.title: Dead Joy-Con controller within 60 days
reviews.review: Have had system about a month and a half and it is played several hours a per week. The left (blue) controller it came with died during play. Will not charge and will not light up and will not reset. Now have to go through the trouble of sending back for "repair".

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
reviews.name: Joshua Rash
reviews.title: Great Way to Spend Time at Home
reviews.review: Fun little device for the young and young at heart. Especially for those who are like me and grew up playing Mario and Pokemon. Like the option to switch between handheld and TV mode easily. Probably the most versatile and innovative gaming device currently on the market.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
reviews.name: Jimi
reviews.title: It changed my stream completely!
reviews.review: I went from a PC only streamer to mostly Switch due to having so much fun with it! There’s so many games that have co-op so my community loves to join in! It’s made me a better streamer and it’s made my love for gaming come back even more! A guaranteed must for anyone of any age.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.name: Dani Hernandez
reviews.title: Product condition
reviews.review: The product is amazing and even tho it took a little while to get to me, it was in perfect conditions which i really liked, plus I loved that I can take it anywhere I want and play with other people too,its very convenient.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.name: RPSILVA
reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review: We got the Nintendo Switch as a Christmas gift for our girls and they’ve loved it.Once we realized that there was a first and second generation we are glad to have spent the extra money to get the second generation because a longer battery life is definitely worth it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
reviews.name: Lexi G
reviews.title: Exactly as described!!!
reviews.review: I was lucky enough to get this at normal price and it’s worth every penny! It makes family game night so much more enjoyable for myself, my significant other, and our six year old. The console was new and as described.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2020
reviews.name: Jeroen Duyvelaar
reviews.title: Came in Perfect!
reviews.review: My switch came in a lot earlier than I was expecting it to so I am over the moon with that! Not to mention that it came in perfect condition (I bought it in New condition but was feeling a little suspicious about it, not going to lie) Everything is working wonderfully right now so I really can't complain at all about the product itself. I definitely paid WAY too much for it (over $500 with tax) but if you're looking for a switch now in this quarantine time, you'll know there's a serious shortage of available consoles. All in all, definitely recommend buying if you're as impatient to get it as I was.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
reviews.name: Omar
reviews.title: Don’t recommend compared to the Xbox
reviews.review: Very disappointing compared to the Xbox! The monthly subscription only gives you access to the old fashion 80s games, all the other games you have to purchase. My daughter has an Xbox as well and we have the monthly subscription that comes with a load of wonderful games!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
reviews.name: anime animal
reviews.title: Good despite some issues
reviews.review: Arrived with the left speaker blown out and buzzing. I cant help but notice theres not much more to do than game on the switch. No internet browser or media player and no apps like Netflix or Hulu. They have Youtube on there for what its worth. The games available on the machine are excellent! At the end of the day thats what we buy the switch for and if it weren’t for the blown speaker I would have given it 4 stars.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2022
reviews.name: Anna Nobeck
reviews.title: Thank you so much
reviews.review: This was a birthday gift for my daughter. It came earlier than you expected and it was perfect 👍

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
reviews.name: NYteacher93
reviews.title: Quarantine boredom be gone!
reviews.review: Came faster than expected and was a welcomed Easter gift. Quarantine had my kids crazy and this was a treat. Couldn’t find it anywhere else, so paid more than normal- but worth it! Packaged with care. Tracked and perfect. Thank you!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.name: Karen
reviews.title: It doesn’t work.Won’t go past power on screen.
reviews.review: Do not buy!What a horrible kids birthday....doesn’t even work and now it is past the return window.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
reviews.name: Victor Alfredo
reviews.title: Es tal como lo publicaron, excelente.
reviews.review: Estoy feliz porque mi hijo está muy contento con su consola de Nintendo Switch. Producto nuevo, sin huellas de uso, con todos sus accesorios nuevos. Si cumplen con lo que prometen.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
reviews.name: AverageCustomer
reviews.title: It’s a nice handheld/hybrid system
reviews.review: I like this console. I use it to play Hot Pursuit Remastered and the other Mario games like the kart racer and the smash bros. I don’t like the fact the online play requires subscription but that’s just gaming nowadays. Overall, this Switch is a nice home/ on the go console and I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020

Touch screen, joy cons, sound, vibration, and everything is working perfectly!Definitely happy with this buy!

It's getting a decent amount of games found on other systems and PC, and if you have more time to play handheld than in front of a TV, it's pretty neat to be able to play some AAA games wherever I am.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2019

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020

Will try to send it to Nintendo for repair, but I am absolutely unhappy about this. And you can imagine how my 7 year old son feels...

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021

I played with it once, then got a strange code, something related to the speakers. They unplugged, then plugged the wire to speakers, and it worked.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2019

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
reviews.name: Ed
reviews.title: Don't Wait!
reviews.review: Have had my switch a little over a month and I love it. I don't know why I waited so long. If you're thinking about getting one, the answer is yes, you need it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2020
reviews.name: Deborah

reviews.review: I bought this for my 6 year old nephew for Christmas. He hasn’t put it down since he opened it! I love that he can play it through the television or it can be used with its own screen so that he isn’t monopolizing the tv!

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
reviews.name: Laurie Lockwood

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
reviews.name: A. Foster

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.name: Denise
reviews.title: Game
reviews.review: Good it works, No problems my son was very happy and we received it before Christmas

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.name: patricia
reviews.title: Scammed by Amazon
reviews.review: Very dissatisfied and disappointed with the purchase that I made. My son waited anxiously for his Nintendo switch to arrive home and when it finally did and we opened the box the console was missing. When we chatted with Amazon representatives about the issue they wanted to refund us our money back with an amazon gift card.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
reviews.name: Daisy Marie
reviews.title: super quick
reviews.review: Thankful to be able to snag one so we can stop arguing about who gets a turn playing it next in the house. When you have 4 people who all want to play and are all stuck at home...it's a nightmare.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
reviews.name: RickyPetite

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.name: Jon Dietrich

Clearly was once in there because the bag was still in the box. Only option were to return it and have a sad 6 year old or sell out $30 and buy a new one. So Nintendo got another $30 out of us. Make sure everything’s there before they start playing with it.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
reviews.name: alicia scott

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2021

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2019

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2020

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.name: co_ghost21
reviews.title: had one since it first came out
reviews.review: Man, where do I start.Ok, the system itself is a great concept for someone that lives in a perfect world to where nothing would affect its Architectual structure. Don't get me wrong it has a lot of great family games and the quality of the graphics are as well great, but Nintendo still has a lot of work to do.Joysticks- Well, I will start off by saying that this system has been handled by myself, my 7-year-old now 11-year-old son, 13 now 17-year-old son, and 14 now 18-year-old daughter. So, we loved to play Mario Kart and any other family games we could find for the switch. At one point (only having the system for no more than 8 months) one of my kids started complaining that their character was moving by itself. I figured joystick was stuck so I moved it around a little and that somewhat fixed the issue. As time progressed so did the problem.I contacted Nintendo which they gave me the standard trouble shooting procedures which I did but did not fix the issue. I did my own research and found out that the joysticks would drift on their own and the only way to fix this was to replace the joysticks on the controller (the black thumb sticks that are a part of the controller themselves). At the time Nintendo was going to charge me $100 to send in my console just to get it fixed (no thank you) I found another method to fix the issue myself for $10 and that is the route I went. Till this day they are still having issues with the joystick "drifting", but they (Nintendo) will not admit to the issue. BUT! I believe they are fixing the issue for free now even though they claim it is not an issue.Docking station- Works well, but if you are not careful you will scratch your screen. Also, if you are not careful you will break the charging port that is on the docking station in your Nintendo Switch. This is of course accidents that can be avoidable depending on the age of the child, or the supervision of handling the device. If your docking station stops working, it is cheaper to buy a C port adapter with power access than it is to buy the expensive docking station. The difference is about $40 I believe.the tablet itself- This thing is durable, but at the same time flimsy. It works to how you need it, but after having it for so long the controllers do not want to stay in place. There are products that Nintendo sells that can help with this of course and make it last longer so that they joysticks do not accidently pop out, but if you are on a spending limit. You will just have to wait till next time and hope whoever you are buying it for is not rough with the system, or constantly takes the controllers off the tablet to play certain games (which the system was intended for).I really do love this system faults and all, but it saddens me when such a great system has so many faults. On top of all that the price on this thing honestly is not worth the buy given everything you deal with. It has been holding strong at $300+ for nearly 4 years now which in my opinion is not worth it at this point. If I knew what I was buying was so fragile I would have waited, but then again, I can honestly say I could go work for the Nintendo repair crew.Just being honest and hoping that you get the full aspect of what you are buying if you haven't already bought one. As well as to think on who you are buying it for when spending that much money. Hope this helps

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2019
reviews.name: D. Young
reviews.title: After two years... very lackluster
reviews.review: I understood when I bought this thing that graphically it was already obsolete before it hit the shelves. I understood there were only a handful of games available (no... having thousands of crappy $10 Indie games available is not a replacement for actual games). I understood Nintendo would take seriously everything that made the Wii U a failure.I will keep this short. Here are my cons:- controllers are horrid (my pro controller stopped working after a year... won't even turn on). My joycons go to home screen when a button is pressed... the left stick drifts like mad.- Game library is noticeably lackluster. Where are the Nintendo games... no I do not mean Wii U games ported to Switch... or ten year old bestsellers now on Switch- Where are the classic Nintendo Games. Why can I not play Ocarina of Time with my kids... do I REALLY have to get a Wii?- The games almost never go on sale... ever... and when they do, it is still not a great deal. Yeah, I want to pay $40 for Skyrim... which sells for $15 everywhere else... PC has sold it for $9- The paid online sucks... what is my money going to? Ok, Splatoon 2 and Minecraft need it... what the heck else am I going to use it for? I can't play Splatoon 2 now, because you money grabbed and gave me what? What am I getting out of this? What? There is nothing good about it... at all...After writing this review, I realized how much disappointment I have with this console... I actually reduced the star rating from 3 to 2. No, it's not a 1... it's better than that. I do not want to hate this purchase, I want Nintendo to provide better service to their customers.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.name: Naomi
reviews.title: Nintendo's Faulty Hardware.
reviews.review: This is a bit of a rant of a review, but I think it's necessary. Nintendo pushed out a product that revolutionized the gaming industry, but they did it in all the wrong ways. So much faulty hardware it's ridiculous. Shortly after purchasing you'll realize your joycons are broken, drifting to the side which ruins the gaming experience. (I've gone through 3, yes, THREE pairs of $80 joycons.) And they will disconnect from the console as a whole which sucks as well especially if you're on an online game or a combat orientated game like BOTW and Splatoon. Leaving you a sitting duck ready to lose because you have to wait for your joycons to reconnect. Also, there is such an issue with the joycons as a whole there have been class action lawsuits against Nintendo because of them. My joycons don't even connect for handheld play anymore so my switch has become a stationary console, and then next to obliterate any chances of me enjoying my switch, that cost just as much as my quality controlled systems like my Xbox, the fan completely quit working which has reduced this console to a ticking time bomb of how long I can actually enjoy it before it auto shuts off unless I fork up the $80 to get it repaired. Which I find ridiculous seeing as I've had all these issues and my switch isn't even a year old.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
reviews.name: bsm
reviews.title: Flexible and fun
reviews.review: Some backstory: I'm a grown woman.As a kid we had an N64 and an original PlayStation.I transitioned to PC gaming in my teens and never looked back to consoles.As an adult I have never had a Wii, Xbox, or newer-generation Playstation.I, like many others, was looking for something to do in my spare time during the COVID pandemic besides watching movies and television.I bought this console in September 2019.I don't have any existing ties to a console (all the controllers are greek to me and would need to be learned) or game franchise.Pros:- The flexibility of this console impresses me even months later.I love being able to grab the unit from the dock and walk around the house with my Pokemon Sword game uninterrupted when someone else wants to use the TV.I love being able to take my unit to a friend's house and dock there.I love being able to use the joycons separately, together in a grip, or use "pro style" controllers.It's obviously a huge selling point and it hasn't disappointed.Looking forward to travelling with it someday.- Great mix of major, indie, and free titles.We have played some of the "major" games (Pokemon) and freemium stuff (Rocket League, Asphalt 9) but gravitate toward strategy/puzzle games like Overcooked 2, Moving Out, Untitled Goose Game, and Donut County.Maybe a similar mix is available on other platforms, I'm just pleasantly surprised at the variety compared to my childhood N64 and PS1 collections.We still have lots of popular games like Zelda or Super Mario to check out in the future.Cons:- The graphics aren't amazing compared to top of the line Xbox or PS consoles.- Certain games have considerable lag/latency during gameplay.- Felt like a decent number of accessories were basically required at the get-go.Have purchased a screen protector, third party controller, hard case for travelling, grips for the individual joycons, and an SD card.Of course no games come included so the price of games is added on to that.- Almost everyone I know who's had the console for at least a year complains about the joycons breaking or drifting.I expect we'll need to replace ours at some point in the next year.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.name: Ama-zong
reviews.title: Absolute end of an era with this garbage console.
reviews.review: This thing is an underpowered and fragile hunk of overpriced junk.I'm not rough with my console, but I'm in need off my 5th set of Joycons.I refuse to buy them$400 worth of faulty controllers is insane.Speaking of which, Nintendo really put the con in Joycon.They are still sold with the same faulty drifting issue and fragile controller body.Want to sue Nintendo for knowingly selling a faulty product?Fat chance.Someone already tried and got tied up in binding arbitration because we all signed away our rights to use this piece of crap.There are many games they continue to sell that don't run correctly on it.Link's Awakening for example has horrible and constant frame rate drops every time you switch screens which is often.Even Animal Crossing becomes unplayable if your island has too many items. Pokemon sword and shield?Complete lag fest with so much graphics culling you run into invisible Pokemon walking around in wild areas.Let's talk games while we're on the subject.There were so few games released for the switch at launch that Nintendo scrambled to find some.Now the eshop it's overrun with shovelware in such quantity you'll never be able to browse through them all to find decent games.Extremely few AAA titles unless they're several years old and you guessed it, they still run badly.Otherwise it's a ton of badly ported mobile games for this over-glorified tablet.You bought one of their many games that don't run well on the limited hardware and it makes you literally sick to play it?Well Nintendo doesn't give refunds.According to them you should have went to YouTube and researched that they were trying to cheat you so it's your fault.Check their FAQ on refunds and you'll see they say you should have known there was a problem.Honestly if Pokemon Arceus is as big of a trashfire as not-so brilliant diamond was then I'm done with Nintendo till they stop ripping off their customers.They used to make solid consoles, then came the New 3DS with it's faulty hinges and then locking consoles if you didn't agree to their new EULA (it happened, Google it) and it's snowballed from there.Get a Steamdeck and stop rewarding bad businesses.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2019
reviews.name: Outrun1986
reviews.title: If you are going to buy a Switch this is the one to get!
reviews.review: The Switch Lite may fall short in many areas, but this is the one to get. Its an improved original switch, with better battery life. However about 2 hours of battery life is the only difference, so if you find the old switch at a discount price that may be worth getting as well. This one has all the features and you can be sure all games will work with it, unlike the Switch Lite. The Switch Lite isn't worth getting IMO.The biggest pro IMO of the switch is the detachable joy-con's. I have never seen a handheld with detachable joy-con's before this one, and its a huge improvement. If you get sticky buttons, worn out buttons or have a problem with your joy-con's you can just swap them with a new set instead of having to replace the whole handheld. Because of Joy-con drift Nintendo is now fixing Joy-Con's for free so you can buy 2 sets of joy-con's and send one out while the other set is getting fixed. I play Pokemon and a lot of it which requires mashing the A button a lot so I used to find that the A button got worn down much faster than other buttons on previous systems. It was a very complicated procedure to fix this problem on previous handhelds, they didn't come apart too easily if you could get them apart at all. If you tinker or like taking things apart its much easier to take apart a single joy-con and replace a button pad rather than it is to take apart most of a handheld to reach the part that needs to be replaced. This increases the longevity of the system and makes it more durable without having to spend a lot of money on future systems.Its important that you look for the switch with the red box when buying, this is the newer model, the older model comes in a white box. Some places are still selling the older version for the same price as the new.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
reviews.name: Midwest_Meanderer
reviews.title: At this price, not ONE game included ?! - Is this a joke?
reviews.review: I received this as a Christmas gift from my brother; an expensive & indulgent one at that, but very thoughtful, nonetheless. Though I am not a 'gamer', I've gone through fits & spurts of playing, but never been interested enough to invest in a consule/etc - my experience the past 20 yrs has been the odd game on my Iphone/Ipad. Today, I finally sat down, ready to see what the hype is over - took everything out of the box, getting set up . . . only to find that there isnt even ONE game included? This was a gift, and I didnt want to know the price, but when I found out I was more than angry with the manufacturer. $300 and no game included? SO very wrong! And looking at the games offered; $50 - $60 bucks a pop? Are you kidding me? No thanks. This will now sit in a box in the closet. Disappointed to say the LEAST.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.name: Crcdds
reviews.title: Crapped out after 2.5 years
reviews.review: I’ve had the Nintendo switch for 2 and 1/2 years now. We don’t use it every day and only put a few hours on the console per week. The console idea is fun and works pretty well changing between the tablet and tv. Our first issue was with the joy-con about a year in to ownership. The joy stick would drift you out of play, even when not being touched. It happened a little at first, then got worse. The Nintendo was still under warranty, so all I had to do was send it in. I had to pay my own shipping and handling but the repair was covered by Nintendo. Annoying that it failed after a year, but paying $20 at the time seemed like not a big deal. Our latest problem is a serious one. We’ve owned it for 2.5 years and it now won’t charge or turn on. I’ve tried all the trouble shooting steps with no luck. It needs to be sent in to Nintendo for a repair. No longer in warrant the repair is going to cost me $99 + about $20 shipping and handling. So 2.5 years in and I’ll have paid almost 1/2 of what the Nintendo originally cost on repairs and shipping. Seems ridiculous to me. I would expect this maybe after 5 years, but I’ve had other consoles I’ve owned for years and I’ve NEVER had to repair them. Next time I’ll avoid the Nintendo and stick with an Xbox.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.name: Sean
reviews.title: An Amazing Little Console
reviews.review: The Nintendo Switch is a great gaming console for people new to gaming and veterans alike. Offering an extensive library of games for both kids and adults, it’s a device the whole family can enjoy. It’s substantially more affordable than its competitors Microsoft’s Xbox One, and Sony’s PlayStation 4. Produced by the well-known gaming giant Nintendo, a company with over 131 years of gaming entertainment under its belt, consumers can rest assured that they are making a quality purchase.The Switch is a hybrid gaming console released by Nintendo on March 3rd, 2017. Since its debut, it has received a significant hardware upgrade in addition to limited editions of the console. On September 20th, 2019, the Switch Lite was released nationwide. This version of the console lacks the hybrid functionality, giving up the ability to connect to a TV in favor of a lower price and a smaller, lighter form factor. The standard console is available at most retailers and online for $299 and the Lite for $199, though COVID 19 has seen these prices climb substantially higher. For this review, I will be focusing on the standard upgraded edition of the platform.The main appeal of a hybrid console is that it can be used in two configurations: handheld mode for portable play, or placed into its dock allowing the device to stream to a TV. The small controllers, called Joy-Cons, slide into slots on the sides when in handheld mode. They can also be removed and used as two separate controllers, saving parents $80 on a second controller for multiplayer situations when docked. The new revision includes a more power-efficient CPU, the brain of the console, and a brighter, more vibrant screen. Upgrading the CPU has led to a 30 percent increase in efficiency, meaning more gaming time when away from a power source. The old battery is reported to last 2.5-6.5 hours and the new one 4.5 to 9 hours, depending on the game and how high the brightness of the screen is set.In terms of software, the Switch offers an extensive library, a must for any gaming console. Without ample software to support the platform, the audience may quickly run out of games to play or things to do; this is not the case with the Switch. The library of games available for purchase can be accessed through the built-in eShop. These games can be downloaded to an SD card inserted into the system. Games can also be purchased physically in a cartridge format for those who would prefer the longevity of owning their library physically. The collection of games offered is vast and ranges from family-friendly titles such as Mario, Zelda, and Donkey Kong; to more adult titles such as Doom, Skyrim, and Wolfenstein: The New Colossus. The support for this system is incredible, primarily due to the fact that the install base is so large. The surge in sales has given incentive to developers and publishers to create more content, something which cannot be said about the previous Nintendo console, the Nintendo Wii U. Even after being on the market for more than three years, the substantial library of games shows no sign of this growth slowing down.At purchase straight out of the box, you get: The main console, two Joy-Cons, the Joy-Con grip accessory, two wrist straps for the controllers, the dock, an AC power adapter, and an HDMI cable. SD cards, games, and Nintendo Online must be purchased separately. Consumers wishing to use the online services can buy a membership for $3.99 a month, $7.99 for three months, or $19.99 for a year. A family plan is also offered at $34.99 a year and covers up to eight consoles. Members gain access to exclusive game titles, Super Mario Brothers 35 and Tetris 99. Membership also includes over seventy NES and Super NES titles. Additionally, Nintendo will allow players to back up thei game saves to the cloud, easing fears of ever losing game progress. What is lacking, however, is any real social aspect to the online community. Without voice chat, a means to message your friends, or in-game achievements, the platform falls short, in this regard, compared to its competitors. Customers have voiced complaints on this matter for years, only to be ignored.Another negative to be aware of is the issue of Joy-Con drift. Over time the thumbsticks are known to wear out, and games will register input when there is no action being performed by the player. Nintendo has vehemently fought against claims that this is an issue, even to the point of being taken to court by many parties in the form of class-action lawsuits. Drift is a reasonably widespread phenomenon and cannot be overstated; the likelihood that you will experience issues with the longevity of your Joy-Cons is high. This may or may not be a concern, as Nintendo offers to replace controllers that experience this. If you have issues with faulty controllers, you’ll likely need to purchase additional ones. The controllers can be bought separately from the console for $80 for use until Nintendo gets around to repairing the ones you already own.In conclusion, I still highly recommend this system despite its shortcomings. The hours I have spent enjoying a vast collection of exciting, engaging titles on it have far outweighed any frustration I have experienced with the controllers' durability or the lackluster online experience. The ability to take your game from the living room to on the go and back again is a real treat. If you’re a busy person looking for an affordable console, this is sure to meet your needs.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.name: Siege
reviews.title: It's the Games that Matter Most
reviews.review: Nintendo has never made a console to directly compete with Microsoft or Sony.They have always done their own thing as the saying goes.The Switch is no different.This hybrid home/portable console is certainly under powered when compared to a PlayStation or XBox.The build quality especially on the JoyCons is not the best.I have been very careful with them.The blue makes a noticeable creaking sound when the thumbstick is moved.The console itself seems solid enough.Game performance is comparable to a higher end smartphone or a PlayStation 3.For me, it is the games, not the hardware, that keeps Nintendo in business.They have so many iconic characters and franchises. There are a lot of well made and polished games available for the Switch.Many are skewed toward a younger crowd, but still enjoyable for adults too.Overall, it is a great family oriented console. I strongly recommend investing in one or more Nintendo Pro-Controllers.

reviews.title: MINECRAFT LOVERS BEWARE!
reviews.review: Minecraft lovers beware! We bought this system two years ago, because they had released minecraft for the switch that year and my son loves minecraft. I have always loved Nintendo products and feel as if they are more suitable for children. With that being said, this system has been nothing but a headache from the get go! The game is glitchy, won't load, or constantly shuts off mid-game. Nintendo has to know the Minecraft game is this way because its been this way for two years with no improvement. We have played on other systems with no problem. We have also had problems with our joy con controllers. The joy stick on both gets stuck in forward and its a pain to get them to connect to the system EVERYTIME! It even doesnt want to connect to it when you slide into the sides to play on the go. Needless to say I feel let down by Nintendo and feel this product is very poorly made. Controllers are also very expensive for this sysyem to not last longer than they did! Don't buy just go with a different system! Unless your child loves mario just buy a different system.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
reviews.name: Tom F.
reviews.title: Nintendo = money grab garbage
reviews.review: I’m so disappointed to just be learning that Nintendo has one of the WORST ecosystems around, I wanted to love them. We got our lite first then a week later a regular switch. I purchased a few (overpriced!) games with the lite, with my account and soon learned my daughter or wife can’t play them in their accounts. Then my wife and I started playing Animal Crossing, I setup my island first and later she did but she remarked how her island had the same name as mine. Turns out Nintendo intentionally limits you to the same island per switch console!WTF kind of money grab is that bulls$&*t Then I purchased 3 months of online gaming on my account on my Switch and started playing the streaming SNES games. My daughter started playing on her lite under my account so she could play Paw Patrol that I had purchased on my account on the lite. It kicked me offline immediately since you can’t have two online at the same time in the same account. So if you have multiple family members, they all need accounts and need to purchase their games all separate on their own accounts. I have never, ever, before seen other gaming systems with such intentional money grab schemes in my life. I tried adding the other accounts together as a family account but Nintendo verifies this by charging the main accounts card! You can just send an email to verify but instead need to charge their card! I’d advise staying away from such a ridiculous product.
